Kelso was trying to have a good time, but he was still thinking about Brooke. Hyde wasn't really interested in anything except spiking the punch, but Jackie needed him nearby to be arm candy. Steven Hyde wasn't quite what Laurie would call "arm candy" but whatever. She was more interested in the snack table. So many desserts, so little time.

Thankfully, she'd been out of high school a bit longer than these losers, so no one recognized her. She spent most of the evening on her own by the snacks, silently enjoying the feeling of these tight pants getting tighter around her middle. Of course, every once in a while, one of the gang would come up and bother her about something.

"Man, this dance bites," Kelso groaned. "I can't stop thinking about Brooke. I mean, both you and me know that every girl in here wants me, but I don't care about any on them."

Laurie rolled her eyes. "Oh my god, Kelso," she grunted as she swallowed down another cookie. "Look, if you want to be with Brooke, go talk to her. You gave her some space. You've given her time to think. Just go hang the hell out with her, okay?"

Kelso looked emboldened by her words. "Yeah, you know what? I'm gonna! Brooke's having my baby - our baby - and I want to be a part of its life! Maybe she'll never fall in love with me, but at least she'll like me enough to let me be a dad! Thanks, Laurie! Since you got fat, you're all wise and stuff, like Buddha!"

Laurie blinked, then shrugged. "I don't know about wise, but... I'm a lot happier!"

Kelso patted her on the shoulder and took off, full of determination.

Laurie wasn't sure if she hadn't just been talking out of her ass right now, but what the hell? It got rid of him, and now she could enjoy more cookies. She actually felt a little aroused by the thought of eating so much, she would have to unbutton her pants in front of these loser teenagers.

She scanned the crowd, trying to find Fez, but there was no sign of him. She briefly had a dreadful thought that he might have hooked up with someone. There were probably some girls who thought he'd be cool just because he'd graduated.

Of course, those hopes were mercifully put to rest when he suddenly came running through the room. Unfortunately, there was a team of linebackers behind him, all trying to grab him so they could beat the tar out of him for god knows what reason. She went over to where Hyde and Jackie were sitting.

"Why the hell are those guys chasing Fez?" she demanded.

Hyde shrugged. "I guess they didn't like his singing."

Jackie nodded. "Yeah, Steven told him everyone would think he was cool if he sang a song onstage. He barely got through three words before they chased him off."

Laurie stared at them. "And you just let them chase him?"

"Relax, he'll probably be at half-mast anytime now," Hyde said. "We'll get him after that."

Laurie glared at him before storming off in the direction of the brutes chasing her husband. She found them down by the lockers not far from the gym, and she saw them all set to grab him and jam him inside of one. He was kicking and squirming, trying to get free, but these guys had fists the size of dumpsters.

"Hey!" she snapped, making them all jump. "Get your big dumb hands off my husband!"

They all stared at her for a long moment. Then at Fez. Then at her again.

Finally, one of them found his voice. "Why don't you back off, you fat bitch!" he shouted.

Before Laurie could think of a plan, Fez's knee suddenly came up and connected with his captor's crotch, causing him to double over in pain. The distraction loosened his grip on Fez's lapels, and he landed a good punch in the second startled musclebound mook's stomach.

Unfortunately, he only had enough time for those two, as the third one grabbed him by the neck and put him in a headlock.

Thankfully, Laurie noticed a discarded textbook lying on the floor - and it was a thick one, too - picked it up and whacked the guy over the head with it. He had to grab his head in due to the shock before Fez grabbed his leg and flipped the guy over onto his back. Then, he grabbed Laurie's hand and dragged her away, causing her to drop the textbook on the guy's head, rendering him temporarily disoriented long enough for them to escape.

They burst outside into the cold air, looking for Hyde's El Camino. As they stood in the freezing parking lot, they took a minute to get their breath back.

"Damn...," Fez panted. "I can't believe... I did that... It truly is a Christmas miracle!"

"You were amazing!" Laurie practically squealed.

"Hey, no one calls my wife a fat bitch," he replied proudly.

She looked him in the eye, giving him her most sexy look. "Oh, but Fez...," she said in a husky voice. "I am a fat bitch." She pressed him against the Camino and put her lips to his, kissing the bejeezus out of him.

For a moment, he was surprised, but then, he started to return it, wrapping his arms around her, and enjoying it as she ran her nails through his hair.

Then, she became acutely aware of something in her downstairs department, and she looked up at him, clearly impressed. "Whoa...," she said breathily. "Even in a Wisconsin snowfall... How'd you manage that?"

"Oh baby," Fez replied in his own deep voice. "You inspire me."

She felt herself go just a little crazy inside as she started making out with him again. They probably would've just had sex in the snow if Hyde and Jackie hadn't just come up behind them.

"Whoa, hey, none of that in my Camino!" Hyde snapped.

"Yeah, ew, guys!" Jackie added. "Get your own sex vehicle!"

Fez and Laurie glared at them but reluctantly came apart.

"Couldn't help but notice a couple of jocks all writhing in pain on the floor," Hyde continued. "You two wouldn't know anything about that, would you?"

Fez put an arm around Laurie. "I was protecting my wife's honor."

"And I was protecting my husband's junk," Laurie added.

"Well, whatever you did, you did a good job," said Jackie. "It's fair to say at least one of them has been reshuffled in the choir, if you get my meaning."

"Indeed," Fez said with a smile. "Now let's get out of here before they regain strength and remember they can still kill me."

"It's okay, Fez," Jackie said, patting his arm. "I'm not rejoining the pep squad. Safe to say none of you have to come here again."

"The Christmas miracles just keep coming."

The ride home was quiet, save for the Christmas music Jackie insisted on listening to. Laurie was snuggled up in Fez's arms in the back. She'd given up a dessert gorge for him. She must truly be in love.

And so, it finally became 1979 - seriously, it felt like it had been 1978 for a few years now.

It was the first time since high school that Laurie had been in a one-on-one relationship. And god knows she and Fez were spending plenty of time one-on-one. More specifically, one-on-top-of-one.

In fact, it was the longest she'd been home in a long time. So even though Fez still irritated him, he was willing to accept this if he truly made her happy. As long as he didn't actually have to live there, he was fine.

She laid there, pondering over whether or not there was a way to combine the three, when she heard movement outside. Curious, she got up. It was probably time for a shower anyway. She'd been slacking on that.

She opened her door and was surprised to find a stack of neatly-folded laundry at her feet. She picked it up and inspected. Where did this come from? She brought it all inside and started putting it away, but now she was starting to shake the cobwebs from her brain. When was the last time she'd done laundry? It was a bit difficult to place a date, but it seemed like the last time was around two weeks ago. Afterwards, she'd just been kind of cycling through her clothes without giving it much thought. But now that she saw them in a neat stack, all nice and clean, she had to wonder - who was doing the laundry?

The whole point of her staying home was to help out her parents after Red's heart attack. Obviously, she'd slacked off quite a bit, if she couldn't even remember the last time she'd done any actual chores around here. So what was the deal? Perhaps she'd better venture outside and find out. She got dressed as quickly as possible - which, with her clothes being fresh from the dryer, combined with her new girth, was no mean feat - and made her way out of her room.

When she got there, she saw Kitty walking around the kitchen, tidying up a bit. She didn't look like she was doing anything strenuous. She didn't look stressed or anything. "Hey, mom," she said. "What's up?"

Kitty looked up and smiled. "Oh, Laurie! There you are! I've been meaning to talk to you."

"About...?"

"Well, sweetie, I think it's just wonderful that you and Fez are making a go of an actual relationship instead of the godless sinful green card marriage it originally was..."

Laurie glared.

"...but...," Kitty awkwardly continued, "I do think maybe you're working that poor boy too hard."

"... I'm what?"

"I mean, he's a very kind young man, and he's been very helpful, but I think he's about to collapse from sheer exhaustion! I mean, he's here everyday, doing all your chores!"

"What?"

"As soon as he gets home from work, he's doing laundry, helping with dinner, doing yard work... I mean, we're very grateful to him, but I think it'd be nice if you helped him once in a while. I mean, I don't see why you have him running around like a chicken without a head trying to do everything!"

Laurie stared. "Mom, I haven't told Fez to do anything."

"You didn't?"

"No, I actually completely spaced on doing chores... I guess I was... enjoying his company so much... I just completely forgot. I had no idea he was doing my chores."

Kitty frowned. "Oh dear... Well, he's outside shoveling the walk right now if you want to, you know... nip that in the bud?"

Laurie nodded and hurried outside into the cold. She grabbed a jacket and scarf and made her way down the thankfully salted driveway to the sidewalk where Fez had his snow shovel, and was working hard.

"Fez?" she called out.

He looked up in surprise. "Good afternoon, my lovely!" he said happily. He leaned in to kiss her, and although she returned it, she saw the dark circles under his bloodshot eyes and realized how tired he must be.

"Fez, are you okay?"

"I have been flying on gossamer wings since I fell for you, my darling!"

Laurie rolled her eyes. There was cute, and then there was corny. "When's the last time you slept?"

"Last night, of course!"

"For how long?"

Fez closed one eye as he did the math in his head. "I estimate about... five hours!"

"Five hours? That's it?"

"Five hours is plenty! Means I have more time to do all the household tasks!"

"Yeah, but Fez, you also have a high-stress job at the hotel to worry about. Look, I'll finish shoveling the walk. You ought to go inside and take a nap before you have to work."

"No, I must insist!" Fez said firmly. "I am your husband, and it is my duty to ensure you live in wedded bliss by you never having to lift a finger! And if that means staying up and working until my back hurts and I hallucinate Bea Arthur dressed as Willy Wonka, then so be it!"

Laurie stared at him. "Fez, that's insane! You're going to destroy your brain if you don't take a break! I mean, I'm all for lying around in bed all day, but not at the expense of your health!"

"But it is my duty! Otherwise, I am of no use to you, and you will have to leave me!"

"What? You... Is that why you're doing all this? You think I'll leave you if you don't wait on me hand and foot?"

Fez shuffled awkwardly, and he was beginning to look increasingly tired as his enthusiasm melted away. "Well... I mean..."

Seeing how sad he looked made Laurie go over and give him a hug. "Oh, Fezzie," she sighed. "You don't have to do any of that to keep me around. I'm with you because I like you. I like the way you make me feel. How special you make me feel. I appreciate all of this, but for god's sake, your head's gonna explode from all this work. And then I'll have to clean up the mess, which kinda defeats the purpose of doing everything for me."

This got a small chuckle, so she continued.

"So how about it? Wanna go inside and take a nap? Leave some of the household chores to your doting, caring and, dare I say it, drop dead gorgeous wife?"

There was no response.

"... Fez?"

"...zzzzzzzzzzz..."

Rolling her eyes, she hefted Fez around until he was draped over her shoulder, and she dragged him back into the house - hoping that nobody thought she had just murdered him or something.
133111211211111111.title: Laurie has a talk with Fez

choices: Time to go home and have some naughty fun!
1331112112111111111.content:
With her nice little "honeymoon" over, Laurie forced herself to go back to doing her chores so Fez could have a break. Back to laundry, dishes, grocery shopping, and basically, anything else around the house. Thankfully, Red was feeling better, and the doctor told him he could still do little things, so it wasn't quite the slog it had been back in the fall.

Another thing Red had time for was "educating" Fez on American culture so he could take his citizenship test. Laurie was a smidgen worried what that would entail, especially due to all the shouting going on in the garage over the proper pronunciation of "America" - "There is no damn 'D' in 'America'!"

He was a little stressed when they got to the office, with him trying to remember all the presidents' names, all the capitol cities and that the Vietnam War had been, as Red called it, a "tie". However, once he got the desk, he was relieved to find that there was no test to take - he just had to sign his name, and he'd be an official American citizen. Laurie tried to get a glance at his name, but his cursive was a little overdone.

Once it was stamped, that was it. He had his green card.

"I am now an official Yankee Doodle Dandy!" he declared.

Laurie pulled him into a big hug. "Fezzie, I am so proud of you!" she squealed.

"I am proud of me, too, my darling! And I didn't even have to remember Mr. Red's dissertation on 'filthy commies'!"

"Come on! We gotta go out and celebrate!"

"Yes, we should!" Fez agreed. "Come on - let this brand spanking new American take you out to dinner!"

"Ooooooh, I like the sound of this already!"

"Yes, no expense spared. I'll give you the finest meal a waiter can buy."

"Oh. Yeah," she said, frowning slightly. But then she smiled again. "Well, maybe there's a place that's cheap."

"You continue to be the woman of my dreams."

So that evening, after looking around at all the restaurants in town, they hit the jackpot. There was an all-you-can-eat place on the edge of town. Only ten dollars per person. Laurie stared at the enormous place - it was mostly chinese food, but there was plenty of everything else as well - chicken strips, chicken legs, corn, peas, salad, mashed potatoes, sweet potatoes...

"Holy crap...," she breathed.

"I know," agreed Fez as he got them a table. "All for ten dollars apiece. What a country!"

Laurie grinned. "Thank god I wore a dress," she said, licking her lips unconsciously. "Don't have to worry about unbuttoning any pants."

In an instant, she already grabbed a plate and was setting off through the buffet, going from tray to tray, piling up all her favorite foods. She took a long time, gathering as much as she could onto that one plate, which increasingly didn't feel big enough, despite being the size of a hubcap.

After five minutes of essentially hunting and gathering, she joined Fez at their table. Forgetting table manners for a moment, she started eating with her fingers for a while, moaning happily as the flavors cascaded across her tongue.

Fez was naturally unfazed. "Everything to your liking, my lovely?"

"Mmph!" Laurie grunted before chewing and swallowing. "This is the best. And so are you."

A big cheesy grin split across Fez's face as he resumed eating his food.

They talked a bit as they ate, talking about family, the latest drama in the gang (Kelso was upset at being the Police Academy "stooge" while Hyde and Jackie were just... whatever the hell they were), and quizzing on if there were any events coming up that would make a decent date night. Of course, Laurie's number one concern was finishing dinner. She ate with great eagerness, thankfully unencumbered by restrictive clothing. Her dress had plenty of room.

All too soon, however, she finished it all. Although she felt a fullness, she wouldn't have said she was full yet, so she excused herself and walked back to the buffet line with another plate. She reloaded it with all the same foods as before, but now she added extra food simply for the sake curiosity. She took seven minutes to finish, but she soon had it loaded up, and, with another drink from the dispenser, staggered back over to her husband, where they resumed their conversation like she had never left.

This became their evening. They would talk and talk about whatever came into their heads, from their childhoods, favorite kid shows to what was the weirdest insect they had ever seen. Somehow, there was always plenty to talk about. The only time they weren't speaking was when Laurie was getting up for another plate.

It amazed her almost. After the second plate, she was feeling full, but she didn't quite feel full. So she went, refilled the plate, came back and had even more food. After the third plate, she was feeling full, but she wasn't really feeling fu-u-u-u-u-u-ull. So she got up for more. By now, however, it had definitely become a waddle. Her stomach was jutting out in front of her like she was nine months pregnant. Pregnant with a food baby. It was so taught and round, you'd think she'd swallowed a bowling ball. She gathered one last plate and carried it back.

Her eating was getting slower now, but she didn't mind. She was having a wonderful evening. She ate while Fez talked about something weird that had happened at work with Hyde. She absently consumed while she enjoyed the sound of his voice. In fact, they were talking for so long that she didn't notice when she was out of food. She leaned back in her chair and listened to Fez talk, hands atop her belly, rubbing it up and down. She kind of wished she could reach under her dress and give it a proper rub, but she didn't want to get banned from this wonderful place.

Soon, they were both sitting in content silence, sipping their drinks and enjoying the increasing quiet of the restaurant. It was late now, but it was okay because Fez the next day free, so he didn't have to worry about work.

"So, my lovely," he said, checking his watch. "What would you like to do now?"

Laurie came out of her food coma at his words and looked around. She looked down at her distended belly and pondered for a moment.
1331112112111111111.title: Fez gets his green card - time to celebrate!

13311121121111111111.content:
Laurie rubbed her stomach contentedly for a few seconds, taking in the sights of the emptying restaurant. There wasn't a lot left to enjoy in the main dining section, but there was one section in particular that she realized she'd overlooked: the dessert section. She saw slices of cake, pie, jello, cookies, not to mention several flavors of ice cream.

She shifted her gut in her hands. Oof - she was already so full. And yet, she could just about taste all of that sugary delectable goodness from their table.

Mind made up, she grabbed her plate. "Come on," she said breezily. "Let's get some dessert before we head home."

Fez let out a breath. "Oof, I don't know. I've already eaten enough to - ooooooh, jello! Yummy!"

Satisfied, Laurie managed to get up from her chair. Her stomach stuck out so far in front it swung like a pendulum, back and forth, before it finally settled and allowed her to move forward. Enjoying the sensation of her bare thighs rubbing against each other, she grabbed another plate and waddled over to the desserts.

For the next seven minutes, Laurie began piling on everything that looked good to her. Some cakes that looked appetizing, some pie that looked delectable, some cookies that looked tasty, and some jello that looked scrumptious. It was the ice cream where she really showed what a pig she was deep down. Eight different flavors to choose from, and she chose about four scoops from each of them, piling them high atop the other desserts she'd gathered. Her mouth was practically overflowing as she carried her enormous feast over to the table.

Licking her lips, she grabbed her spoon and tucked in. Ohhhhhhhh, it was all so good! All the different ice creams blended together in her mouth - chocolate, vanilla, strawberry, cookie dough, cookies n creme, sherbert, peach and rocky road - and gave her a high one of Hyde's Circles could never achieve. She shoveled it all into her mouth, swallowing it into her already tightly-packed belly.

As she worked through all this, Fez was clearly talking about something. She had listened attentively over dinner, but this was dessert - and she was having trouble focusing over the cascade of sweetness drowning her taste buds. She was half-tempted to just throw the utensils away and just stick her whole face in the food. She began to imagine she was eating a whole pile of dessert out of a trough - like the pig that she was.

Damn. Now she was getting horny. Great. She hoped she wouldn't stain her dress. At least, not until they were in the car.

Besides, she had to finish all of this. She'd gotten through the ice cream's outer layer and was now focused on all the now-soaked delectables underneath. She shoved everything she could into her mouth, but she was becoming increasingly aware of how tight her dress was getting. She hadn't dared look at her stomach yet, but she imagined it was bulging something fierce.

It took a solid fifteen minutes to chow her desserts down, but she did. She didn't leave anything behind, save a few crumbs. She even slurped up the melted ice cream. She set her plate down and leaned back, letting out a sensual groan as she did so. She felt was more than full.

She felt stuffed.

And not just stuffed.

She felt stu-u-u-u-u-u-u-uffed.

She finally dared to peer down at her midsection. It stretched out so far now - like one of those globes owned by a Bond villain that you could open up, and it'd have booze inside. She rubbed it gingerly.

Fez smiled serenely at the sight. "Are you ready to depart?"

Laurie could only nod, letting out a small whimper.

Fez came around the table and eased his overstuffed wife to her feet. She put an arm around his shoulders and leaned on him, practically being dragged outside and back to the car. She was in too much pain to move much, so Fez helped her with her seatbelt. She thought there was no way it could possibly reach all the way around such a massive gut, but it didn't take long for her to hear the usual click. She felt oddly disappointed.

The drive home was quiet. Laurie had to recline the seat back to sit comfortably. She continued to rub her stomach, feeling out jam-packed it was. She was so utterly and completely stuffed she could barely breathe.

And it was making her so hot.

They finally made it home, and she was relieved to find there was no one home at the moment. Both Red's and Hyde's cars were gone, indicating that everyone was probably out right now. Thank god. She was about to burst.

It took a few minutes to get her inside, but that only made it worse. This was like her immobility dream. Okay, she wasn't so huge she was trapped, but she still had to rely on Fez for movement. He gently helped her get on the bed and got her shoes and socks off.

"Do you require anything else, my darling?" he asked, leaning in close.

"Yeah...," Laurie whispered, wrapping her fingers around his shirt collar. "... You."

Before he knew what was happening, she was kissing the living daylights out of him once again. He was clearly surprised, and after a moment, they parted.

"Are you sure? Because movement seems to be a problem for you right now, and I tend to be a bit... movey... when we make love."

"I'm damn sure," Laurie said in a husky voice. "I'm so stuffed it's making me crazy. I want you so bad right now, Fezzie. Now get me out of this dress, get those pants off and fuck me like the fat naughty pig that I am."

Fez's eyes widened, and then an excited grin came across his face as he began to undo his pants. Even when she was blinded by hormones, Laurie couldn't help but swoon over how cute he was when he was excited about sex.

She insisted on skipping their usual foreplay. She was so aroused, she didn't think she could make it that far. Fortunately, Fez was very good at 'standing to attention' when the need 'arose'. It was amazing. He had gotten better at sex the more often they did - he'd only had sex with one other girl before her - but this was incredible. Having sex while also stuffed like a turkey on Thanksgiving was the most wonderful thing. She arched her back, which only made her belly stick out even more. She rubbed it, listening to the gurgling inside as her massive meal was sloshed around.

When she finally came, it was such a relief. She slumped against the bed and gasped for air. "Holy crap, Fez...," she panted. "Oh my god..."

They laid there in bed, his arms wrapped around her. She couldn't roll over - still too stuffed for that.

One of his hands went down to her enormous belly and began to rub it, and holy moses, that felt good, she thought. His soft gentle hands rubbing circles on her gut. Her enormous big fat gut. Her enormous big fat stuffed gut.

A smile spread across her lips. This was bliss. Utter bliss. Lying in bed, in her man's arms, with a belly stuffed to the point that it seemed to tower over her, and his hands on it.

Her only regret was that it had taken this long to get here.
13311121121111111111.title: Time for dessert!

choices: Valentine's Day rolls around - time for romance!
Jackie is a little turned on by Laurie
133111211211111111111.content:
Laurie woke up around ten o'clock. She blinked at the sunlight coming through her window and wrapped her quilt around herself against the cold February weather. She rolled over in bed and found not only was Fez not there, but there was a piece of paper in his place. She snatched it up and read that a phone call had come for him that morning. Apparently, one of the morning waiters had contracted food poisoning and couldn't come in for work, so they'd asked to him to come in. He apologized for leaving without saying goodbye, but was too moved by the sight of her so peaceful in her sleep that he didn't have the heart to wake. He would be home by two o'clock, and they'd have the day together.

Laurie smiled. While disappointed he hadn't been here, she did appreciate the note and that it would only be a few hours before he was home, giving her time to do chores and have some time to herself. Hopefully, she thought eagerly, that would include a huge breakfast. She rolled over again to get out of bed, but her stomach let out a gurgling sound that indicated that she hadn't quite digested all of her previous night's gorge. She wasn't as full as she'd been, but she was starving either. She ran her hands over her belly and gave it a jiggle. She lifted her top and found there were some lovely new stretchmarks forming along the front and sides. Her smile grew wider.

Even if she wasn't exactly starving, Laurie was still eager to partake in some breakfast. She got up, changed into something more presentable and made her way down to the kitchen. She found it empty, with Red working on the car in the garage while Kitty was clearly at work. Pleased to have the run of the kitchen, she set to work on her decided meal - a big stack of waffles. She started mixing it together and got out the waffle maker.

As she cooked, she quietly thought about what it would be like to have an apartment with Fez. Just the two of them in their own little love / sex den. She could get a job somewhere, split the rent with him and enjoy the privacy of living alone. Maybe once her dad was fit for work again, she could get on that. Find something where she could sit on her growing ass all day.

Smiling to herself, she soon finished making her waffles. She found that she had made at least six. That would hold her over til lunch. She quickly began to pour syrup over them, followed by slathering them in a lot of butter, and she sat at the table to eat. She cut into them and had a few bits. Damn, she made good waffles. Maybe she'd make more later.

She was just working through them all when the screen door slid open, and in walked Jackie, who stopped short when she saw Laurie. "Oh. Hey," she said, almost like she'd walked in on something inappropriate.

"Hey," Laurie said through a mouthful of waffles. "Looking for Hyde? Probably still downstairs."

"Yeah, probably," Jackie replied, still staring at her as if she was some kind of freak.

Laurie continued to eat for a few seconds before she realized that Jackie hadn't moved. "You okay?"

Jackie looked awkward for a moment before taking a tentative step forward. "Laurie, what's happened to you lately?"

Laurie blinked before swallowing her latest mouthful. "... Huh?"

"What do you mean, 'huh'? Look at yourself! You're blowing up like a balloon! You're eating like a pig! You used to be one of the most attractive women in Point Place!"

Laurie winked playfully. "You're not so bad yourself, kid."

Jackie harrumphed and continued. "And now, you look like just about any other woman in Point Place! What are you doing to yourself?"

Laurie grinned in amusement. "Well, I'm retiring from whoring around town, settling down with my lovely husband, helping my family in their time of need..."

"And stuffing your fat gut full of sugar and carbs," Jackie added disdainfully.

Laurie shrugged. "Not gonna deny it. I'm enjoying good food where and when I want it."

"And look what it's doing to you! You're a round fat tub of lard!"

Laurie stared at her for a long moment, and Jackie briefly wondered if maybe she'd actually offended her. This thought was laid to rest when the other girl smiled at her with a look previously reserved for every guy she found worthy of intercourse and, lately, reserved for Fez. It made Jackie a teeny bit uncomfortable. Laurie leaned back in her seat and began to rub her huge belly, which somehow looked even bigger than it had when Jackie had chanced a hidden glance at it yesterday.

"What's the matter, Jackie? Don't think women should have a little heft on them?"

Jackie's mouth fell open, and for once, it seemed she'd been rendered speechless. Laurie took advantage of the situation.

"You think this is bad?" she asked, indicating her half-finished waffles. "You should've seen me last night. An all-you-can-eat buffet. I took plate after plate of food back to my table. And I ate it. All of it. Every last bit of it. Getting heavier with each and every trip. Big fat me waddling to and from the buffet lines. My stomach stretching so far in front of me. Everyone must've thought I was pregnant. Just the amount I shoveled down my gaping maw into my enormous stomach. It's a miracle I still fit through the front door when I finished. Fez practically had to roll me to bed."

She smirked, still clutching her stomach.

"Not that that deterred us from some of the hottest sex I have ever had last night..."

Jackie's eyes widened, and her jaw continued to hang open in shock.

Laurie stood up and slowly approached Jackie. "That's right. Last night, while I was so stuffed I couldn't even think, my husband took me, and he had me. Had me like the fat pig I am. And it was so hot. So sexy. Just that wild crazy sex. Too bad you weren't home. Would've given you and Hyde some ideas."

She leaned in until she was whispering in Jackie's ear.

"But of course, you and Hyde could never be as hot as we were. Not like this."

She brushed her round belly against Jackie's flat stomach, causing the younger girl to shiver a little.

Laurie pulled back and looked her in the eye. "Anything else to say?" she asked.

Jackie shook her head, clearly rattled.

Laurie acquired a bright smile. "Good! Glad we had this talk! Hyde's downstairs!" And she happily bounced back to her chair and resumed eating her breakfast.

Jackie let out a breath she didn't know she'd been holding and scampered off towards the basement.

Laurie smirked and finished up her meal. She'd get started on laundry soon, so she'd definitely enjoy visiting the happy couple downstairs later.
133111211211111111111.title: Cut to the following morning

choices: Laurie joins in on the Circle - munchies!
1331112112111111111111.content:
Laurie looked herself up and down in the mirror. She had worked hard to find a nice dress that would suit the occasion. After all, it was her first Valentine's Day on an actual date in years, and this was the first time she'd actually cared about the guy she was with. She wanted tonight to be something special. It'd taken some time to find a dress that fit her. She'd ballooned considerably in the past week. Her gut was still protruding from the nonstop binging she'd indulged in of late. The red dress she'd found hugged every delectable pound, showing every roll, and it accentuated her breasts nicely. Her bare arms were nice and thick, and her blatant double chin was jiggling every time she turned her head.

In a word - HOT

Giving her belly a good hard jiggle for luck, she went to the closet and pulled out a coat to wear. It was February in Wisconsin, after all. It wouldn't be spring until sometime in June, probably. She still looked nicely plump with it covering her up. She smirked contentedly before leaving her room to meet her husband in the kitchen.

When she got there, she found Fez chatting with Hyde, Jackie and Kelso as they were getting ready to start their respective romantic evenings.

"...and then, Steven's taking me to see Same Time Next Year at the theater," Jackie was saying eagerly, looking positively dolled up.

Kelso frowned. "Wait... isn't that the one with Hawkeye from M*A*S*H*?"

"It's a love story, Michael. Very romantic."

"It's about a guy and a girl who are married to other people and meet once a year to have sex," Hyde clarified.

"There's more to it than that!"

"So at no point does Radar come out to announce choppers are arriving?" Kelso asked.

"Oh, shut up, Michael. Go take Brooke on whatever sad excuse for a date you're going on."

Kelso squeaked indignantly. "Hey! We're going to a nice restaurant! And no, there are no crayons on the tablecloth!"

"Wow," Fez said, impressed. "My big handsome buddy's growing up."

"Thank you, Fez. I'm glad somebody's noticed."

Laurie smirked as she entered the room. "Hello, children," she said passively. "Everyone got plans tonight?"

They all turned to see her. Fez, naturally, lit up, while Kelso and Hyde nodded in her direction. Jackie saw her, started to blush and looked away. Laurie held back a grin. Good to know she'd made an impression.

She crossed over to Fez and gave him a kiss. "Ready to go, babe?"

"Ready whenever you are, dream boat," Fez replied with a sleazy grin.

She matched his sleaze and linked arms with him. "Nighty-night," she said, winking broadly at the others. "Don't do anything I wouldn't do."

Hyde raised an eyebrow. "That doesn't really narrow the field much."

"Oh, I know," she replied, sending another sleazy grin his way.

Enjoying the bemused look behind his shades, she walked after Fez for the car. He held the door open for her, making her switch from sleaze to blushing schoolgirl. She didn't know how, but somehow, he always made her feel special. She slid herself into the passenger seat and stretched the seat belt around herself. It was still a snug fit, and she loved it.

Soon, they were on the road. They chatted about Fez's job, Laurie's chores, amusing anecdotes concerning their friends, and the future. Laurie was still considering finding a job so they could get their own place, so they were going to peruse the want ads to see what they could find.

But for now, they were going to have a romantic evening. Fez had been saving some money just for this occasion. The restaurant wasn't exactly the fanciest in town. Hell, it wasn't even the fanciest on the block. It was very simple. But it wasn't fast food, which was what Laurie wanted to hear. As much as she loved greasy takeout, she wanted something a bit more savory.

And that was how they discovered a Point Place steakhouse having a two-for-one sale on Valentine's Day.

They pulled into the parking lot, and right away, Laurie could smell the delicious smell of meat. Her tummy gurgled with hunger as they got up and walked inside. It was a tad crowded, being Valentines Day and whatnot, but it wasn't a long wait for a table. Once there, it only took a minute for Laurie to know what she wanted - the biggest steak they had with fries, chicken strips and salad on the side.

They enjoyed their evening together, chatting through the night, talking about what movies they wanted to see. Fez really wanted to see the Muppet Movie, and she was happy enough oblige as long as they had plenty of candy and popcorn.

The steak was enormous. It took up the whole plate, and it smelled amazing. Her sides took up a lot of room on their respective plates, too. She licked her lips eagerly. Fez really did know how to treat a fat girl right.

They ate in silence, as had become the norm for them. Fez had learned that Laurie was a decent conversationalist until food arrived, at which point, she much preferred to use her mouth for eating. So apart from a few sentence sprinkled here and there to keep things interesting, Fez only spoke when spoken to.

Laurie enjoyed the immense steak immensely. Hell, she enjoyed everything. She only wished the place wasn't so pricey so she could eat here every day. So much succulent meat for her growing belly.

Speaking of which, her belly was definitely stretching out her dress a bit. Good, she thought. Make it fit better. Because based on the way Fez kept glancing at her, she had a feeling that this was going to be one of his favorite outfits she wore.

God, the way he made her feel. It was like being a teenager again. All giddy and optimistic, like they were going to be together. To think he'd been worried that she'd ever leave him just because he couldn't one hundred percent dedicate his life to her. There were times she honestly didn't feel good enough for him, if only for how devoted and loving he was.

She looked over at him, eating his smaller steak. He'd taken a small so she could have the largest one available. God, she loved him.

That made her stop mid-chew.

She loved him. She had actually fallen for Fez.

She'd suspected it for a while now, but now it was really impacting on her. When she'd first met him, she remembered him being the weird little foreign boy her loser brother had befriended. Hell, she remembered the first time they saw each other. He'd exclaimed, "Who is that goddess?" At the time, she'd barely registered it. Now, she felt bad for blatantly ignoring him. Granted, she didn't regret not getting with him sooner. She wasn't sure any relationship would've been possible had events not transpired the way they had.

They finished their meal, paid the bill, and he once again had to help his bloated wife to the car. She laid back in the seat and rubbed her stomach.

"Ugh, I'm so full," she moaned.

"Come along, my darling," Fez said cheerfully. "Let's get you home."

"Agreed. This dress has become way too tight."

"Mmmmm, I like where this is heading!"

Laurie smiled in the darkness as they pulled out onto the road. She leaned her head over and stared at him. The man she loved. Man, this had been a crazy year. It had started with her normal whoring around the US, and now she was in love with Fez. Still, it made sense. She was the easiest girl alive, and he was the horniest guy. It was like an X-rated fairytale.

When they got home, they sat in the car for a few moments. Mainly because they saw Red and Kitty were home, and they didn't want the current romantic spell they were under to be broken. So they just leaned against the seats and stared into each others eyes.

And with no prompting whatsoever, Laurie said, "I love you, Fez."

There was a brief pause as the words impacted on his brain, and his mouth fell slack. She briefly wondered if she had timed this utterly wrong.

But then, much to her immense relief, a big smile split across his face, and he said, "I love you, too, Laurie."

Her smile doubled in size, and she leaned in to kiss him. He pulled her closer, and then, much to her delight, he put his other hand on her full belly. She let out a moan of pleasure as he rubbed it.

The sound of the screen door slamming shut snapped them out of it, and they looked up to see an irate-looking Red and an embarrassed Kitty looking out at them.

Fez cleared his throat and quickly put his hands at ten-and-two. "Yes, well," he said, looking straight ahead. "Perhaps we'd... better go in now..."

Laurie did her best to fight back a large amused grin, silently nodding in agreement.
1331112112111111111111.title: Valentine's Day rolls around - time for rom...

choices: Jackie is on the couch, all upset
13311121121111111111111.content:
As Laurie and Fez's relationship settled into something genuine and loving, it soon became clear that if she was going to be with him, she'd have to get used to hanging around the gang all the time. For the most part, this was fine. Although they still sniped at each other, she and Hyde had more or less dialed down from mutual hatred to a grudging respect for each other due to having to help out while Red recovered. Kelso was usually okay with her, having gotten over their affair some time ago, and being consumed with preparing to both become a father and a cop, he was less concerned with restarting anything. Jackie, of course, was clearly still a bit rattled after their kitchen encounter a few weeks ago, but she hadn't said anything to the others, so everything must be fine. Just to mess with her further, Laurie deliberately didn't make eye contact with her for a long time.

So one thing Laurie found herself doing more often was hanging out with them during one of their more frequent activities - smoking "killer shit" in the basement in a circle. Hyde always had some somewhere, and he was always willing to share. Laurie was no stranger to it - she'd been in a few circles before - but this time, she was more of a friend.

She was typically on the couch next to Fez, while Jackie was on Hyde's lap, and Kelso on the lawn chair.

"I can't believe I'm the only one here without a girl," Kelso pouted. "I mean, come on. I'm the best looking one here! What's this say about me?"

"That you're a sad loser who's alienated every woman in Point Place by only wanting them for sex?" Hyde suggested.

"Sounds like a fair description to me," Laurie agreed, munching on some chips.

"Hey, that's not fair! Things are still going well with Brooke! I should be able to bring her here!"

"You can't bring a pregnant woman to a circle, dummy!" Jackie objected.

"What, just because she's pregnant? That's so prejudiced, Jackie!"

"No, because the baby's gonna come out all weird if she breathes too much of the smoke, moron," Laurie snapped.

"Yeah, and nothing's worse than an ugly baby," Fez nodded.

Kelso sulked. "Fine, but once she has that baby, she's down here all the time, got it?"

"Yeah, yeah, whatever," Hyde sighed.

Jackie raised an eyebrow in Laurie's direction. "Might want to give her a chance to lose all that baby weight first," she said snidely. "Munchie's will make her look pregnant forever."

Laurie narrowed her eyes at Jackie, knowing exactly where the little midget was going with this. Fez, however, spoke first.

"Oh, I don't know...," he said casually. "If it really is love, it doesn't matter what size she is. I mean, Kelso, you still find her sexy even though she's growing in the middle, yes?"

Kelso blinked in confusion at the weird direction this had taken. "Well... sure, I guess. I mean... she's pregnant, so she can't help it."

"Do you think you would still be into her if she were fat?"

"I... don't know... I mean... now that I know her and stuff, I guess... maybe? How fat are we talking here?"

"How about as fat as me?" Laurie asked, raising an eyebrow.

Kelso started laughing. "Well, I mean... sure, I guess. I mean, yeah, you've blimped up, Laurie, but you still got that... I dunno... thing about you..."

Fez smiled, patting Laurie's knee. "Damn right, she does."

Laurie gave them both her usual ditzy smile. "Aww, thanks, guys!"

Jackie frowned in their direction. She'd been kinda hoping to embarrass or annoy Laurie, not build her up even more. Feeling her lip go all pouty, she nudged her boyfriend. "Steven, would you still love me if I was fat?"

Hyde shrugged. "That's cool."

"No, no, no, don't go all zen on me! Give me an answer!"

Hyde rolled his eyes behind his shades. "Fine. Jackie - I would still love you no matter what size you were."

Kelso, Fez and Laurie all put their hands to their chests. "Awwwwwwwwww!"

"Get bent!" Hyde snapped. "This is inappropriate circle talk!"

"He's right," Fez agreed. "Let us leave this on the back-burner and talk about something more important. Like the Muppets."

So, of course, with the effects of the smoke taking full effect, they launched into a heated debate over just what the hell Gonzo was supposed to be, how the Pigs in Space actually breathed and if Jim Henson was using the Electric Mayhem's music to send out government-mandated hypnotic messages. Of course, it then turned to whether or not Kermit and Miss Piggy could ever have a real relationship as a frog and a pig, and then that switched to weather or not Miss Piggy counted as "plus-sized" and if that should be a factor, but they all soon forgot what they were talking about when Helter Skelter came on the record player.

By the time it was over, they were all feeling really mellow and shuffling off into the night.

Laurie, however, began to feel particularly ravenous. Her appetite had certainly increased in recent months, but this was insane. This was an overriding need to just eat, eat, EAT! She scurried up the stairs to the kitchen and began going through the fridge, looking for anything that looked remotely good - or even just edible. She began to just eat bologna straight from the package. She didn't care about taste right now. She just wanted FOOD!

All too soon, though, the bologna was gone, and she had to find something else. She opened a jar of pickles and ate a few of those, but then the ham looked good, and then some juice, and then a few apples... Now she was getting bored with cold food. She started opening the cupboards. There were saltines up there, which she grabbed and proceeded to consume. In the midst of this, she also saw a jar of peanut butter. Oh, jackpot! She opened it, got out a knife and started spreading the peanut butter on the crackers, making them much more delicious, but then also much more difficult to chew and swallow. So she got out the carton of milk and took a few chugs just to get them all down.

It was another ten minutes before she'd finished the crackers and was now just spooning peanut butter into her mouth, chasing each one with another chug of milk. The effects of the circle were beginning to calm down, and she was feeling a bit better. But by the time she was almost completely back to normal, she found the jar and carton empty, and she was covered in crumbs and stains.

And then she let out a belch that was so powerful that she jolted backwards from the force. She looked around the kitchen in a daze. "Phew!" she cried. She patted her stomach, pleased to see how taut it was. She was going to have to smoke a few more joints with the gang. She liked the effect it had on her waistline. She checked out her silhouette against the wall and admired the bulge of her belly. She gave it a few pats before giving it a hearty slap, enjoying the sound and the sensation it caused. Content that she was full, she set about throwing away the trash and heading into the living room to rest for a bit.

When she got there, however...
13311121121111111111111.title: Laurie joins in on the Circle - munchies!

choices: Jackie begins a weight gain regimen
133111211211111111111111.content:
Laurie had been all set to have a nice food coma on the couch, so she was a bit disappointed when she saw Jackie sitting there in what appeared to be a full blown pout. She was sitting there, arms crossed, glaring at the TV, feet on the coffee table and looking like a sullen teenager - which she technically was, but still.

"Oh. You're still here," she said. "Thought you went home."

"No," Jackie grumbled. "I'm mad."

"Ah. About...?"

"Well, you should know! You were there!"

"... For...?"

Jackie sighed theatrically. "You heard what Steven said!"

"About the Muppets uniting against the government?"

"No! He said, 'I would still love you no matter what size you were.' Can you believe him?!"

Laurie blinked. "Yeah, what an asshole. Is that it?"

"He has the nerve to just sit there behind his shades and just lie to me like that! I know he didn't mean it! Not really! I mean, where does he get off, acting like getting fat is no big deal!"

Laurie crossed her arms and arched an eyebrow. "Do you want to consider your next words very carefully before I have to re-educate the tar out of you?"

Jackie looked up at the bulbous blonde and realized. "Oh... no, I mean... well, I just... How can Steven be okay with me getting fat? I know everyone thinks it's easy being this gorgeous, but it actually takes a lot of work! You know how much food I have to not eat to stay this thin?"

Already feeling tired just listening to the younger girl, Laurie felt compelled to sit back in her dad's chair and pretend she was listening. "I can't imagine," she muttered.

"Of course not! No one can! You know how often I've looked at a pizza and thought I'd love to have more than just my usual half a slice? To go to Fatso Burger and order something other than Diet Rite? To ask them to put something else other than the meat and the veggies on the burger? I would love all of that, but I don't, because I'm not so selfish as to ruin my body and deprive everyone of my perfection!"

Laurie was getting a headache now. She rubbed her temples and thought about how to do something about this. Then, as she considered Jackie's words, she began to get an evil idea, and a sinister grin spread across her face before she managed to reign it in and fake looking concerned.

"Well, you have an option here," she said calmly.

"What's that?"

"Call Hyde's bluff."

"How?"

"Oh, I think you know how."

Jackie's brow furrowed as she tried to figure out where this was going, and then her eyes widened in blatant shock when she figured it out. "What?! You're saying... I should get fat?! No, I can't! I...! Well, I just can't! I have to stay physically fit!"

"What for? You quit the cheer squad. You're graduating in a few months anyway. Just kick back and let yourself go."

"But... but I can't! What if I...? What if I lose Steven?! What if he thinks I'm ugly and doesn't want me anymore."

"Oh please," Laurie scoffed. "Behind those shades and goofy hair, he loves the crap out of you. Not because you're thin, but because you're Jackie, and no amount of fat is going to change that."

Jackie blinked. She'd genuinely never considered that before. She was quiet for a little while, trying to figure out what to do. "... I... You really think he'll still want to be with me?"

"Yep. I'll bet you anything that he will."

"... I... don't know what to do..."

Laurie shrugged and went for the phone. "Well, I'm going to order a large pizza, covered in meat, and cheese, and peppers. I might even get bread sticks - loaded with carbs. You're welcome to join me if you want." She was really too full right now for a large pizza, but she figured if she played her cards right, she could trick Jackie into eating most of it.

Jackie stared at her for a long moment, and then, in an instant she was on her feet with a steely look in her eye. "Let's do it," she said forcefully. "Let's fat me up. I'm not leaving until I have to be rolled out of here!"

Laurie raised an eyebrow. "Okay, this isn't a cartoon," she said. "I mean, it's taken me almost a whole year to get this fat."

"Oh... well then, I'm not leaving until I feel slightly bloated and maybe a bit sick!"

"That's more like it!"

And so Laurie ordered the pizza, with Jackie excitedly pacing back and forth while she made the order. She couldn't help but smirk. She had absolutely no idea what would happen if Jackie got fat - Hyde would probably stay with her, but who knows? She just enjoyed the opportunity to mess with the younger girl a bit. Nothing serious - just plump her up. Maybe make her see that gaining weight was no big deal.

And if she happened to gain some weight in the process... Well, she'd just have to live with that.
133111211211111111111111.title: Jackie is on the couch, all upset

1331112112111111111111111.content:
A few days went by, and Laurie decided it was time to start Jackie off on the right foot. They picked a day where they were both free, and with kisses goodbye to their respective guys, got into Jackie's lincoln and drove off into town - although Laurie had commandeered the steering wheel on the off-chance Jackie wimped out.

Which, she could already tell by looking at her, was a danger of happening.

"Okay," Laurie said, breezily. "We'll start by Waffle House for breakfast. Then run by the frozen yogurt place. Then I'm thinking Fatso Burger for lunch. Maybe some light snacking throughout the day. And then we'll see how we're feeling when dinner rolls around..."

"Uh huh...," Jackie nodded with a considerable deal of uncertainty. She kept tapping her fingers on her leg and peering out the window.

She had followed Laurie's instructions to wear something loose. If you were going to acquire mass, you need room to expand. Of course, she didn't really have anything roomy, so she was wearing something that rather hugged her thin-yet-curvy figure. She glanced down at her slim middle and worried. What was going to happen today?

Laurie saw the look of apprehension in her eyes. "You okay?"

"Hmm? Oh yeah, I'm fine. Totally down with this. I'm... totally up for getting fat."

"Uh-huh... Look, just relax, okay? It's just for one day. It's like we're trying it on for size. We'll see how a day of unbridled gluttony suits you, and if it doesn't, it doesn't. No worries."

"No, I have to do this," she said, trying to convince herself along with Laurie. "I need to know if Steven really loves me for me, and not just because I'm smoking hot."

"Right... Well, time to put your money where your mouth is! Here we are!"

Jackie gulped as they pulled into the Waffle House parking lot. Theoretically, they could've walked there, but Laurie said they weren't looking to burn calories. They went inside, and right away, they could smell the aroma of breakfast food. It smelled divine. Laurie beamed at the scent, but Jackie was terrified. She followed the other woman over to a booth. She took note of how the blubbery blonde had to take a deep breath to fit behind the table. She peered down a the considerable gap between herself and the table. How long before she had trouble fitting behind tables?

"All right," Laurie said, going over the menu. "Follow my lead, okay?"

"... Okay...?" Jackie said uncertainly.

When the waitress asked for their order, Laurie immediately rattled off, "I'll have an egg and cheese omelette, two eggs over easy, a double waffle, a side of bacon and a glass of orange juice. Jackie, how about you?"

Jackie blanched as she realized where this was going. Just the thought of all those calories made her dizzy. "Er... Same for me," she stammered, handing the waitress her menu.

The waitress smiled politely and took the menus away.

"Good girl," Laurie cooed.

"Ugh, what am I doing?" Jackie moaned, putting her head in hands. "I must be crazy."

"You know what's crazy?" Laurie asked in a low voice. "Forcing yourself to be thin just because you think it's the only way to be acceptable to men. That's what I thought. That's how I lived. And what did I get? Practically addicted to emotionless empty meaningless sex. Now, I'm not saying I regret most of my decisions. They led me to where I am now. But I really wish I could've discovered this joy earlier. This joy of deciding that, yes, I'm fat, and yes, I enjoy it, and no, it's nobody else's business. If Fez hadn't accepted me, I would've divorced him the minute he had his green card. If Hyde can't accept it, you kick his ass to the curb. We do not need to be validated by others, okay? You have to focus on what you want, and I think what you want is to eat some damn real food. True?"

Jackie stared at her in shock. She had never seen Laurie so righteous before. She thought for a moment about what she was saying and realized. "I really do... Sometimes, I look at the others, eating real food... Like, eating cheeseburgers and pizza, and I'm sitting there thinking, 'God, I wish I could enjoy that greasy savory food like they could'..."

Laurie gave a wicked smile. "I had a feeling. That's what we're doing. And yes, it's crazy. But who says crazy has to be a bad thing?"

A moment later, their plates were set down before them, and they saw the huge mountain of food upon them.

Laurie licked her lips and started eating.

Jackie sat for a moment, considering the aroma. It was heaven in her pert little nostrils. Good lord, she was actually salivating just looking at them. Tentatively, she grabbed her fork and took a small bite of her omelette. "... Oh my god, it's good...," she practically whimpered.

"Atta girl," Laurie approved through a mouth full of breakfast.

From then on, Jackie took increasingly bigger bites. She worked her way through every bit of her breakfast, enjoying the rich flavor and the cholesterol that came with them. They ate in silence - Laurie not wanting to distract her from her work. They just ate and ate for a good fifteen minutes until it was all gone, and all that was left was two stuffed young women in the booth.

Laurie let out a deep breath, letting her belly press against the table edge, gently tapping her fingers on it. "Yeah, I don't eat here often," she said breezily. "I'm getting to the point I really need a table. Room to breathe, y'know?"

"So why'd we come here if you don't fit?"

"Cuz it feels sexy," Laurie replied, grinning sleepily.

Jackie blushed. She wasn't sure if she felt sexy right now, but she definitely felt stuffed. Her flat tummy had a slight bulge to it that she couldn't ignore. It wasn't uncomfortable or anything. Just... full.

"So, what next?" she asked.
1331112112111111111111111.title: Jackie begins a weight gain regimen

13311121121111111111111111.content:
Laurie managed to "uncork" herself from the booth and led Jackie out the door. "Come on! Time for frozen yogurt!"

Jackie blanched. She was already so full. "Seriously? We don't even stop to take a breather?"

"Relax. You'll have time to digest in the car."

They plopped down in the car and buckled up. Jackie tried to subtly watch as her driver struggled with the seat belt a bit as the connector was lost somewhere beneath her growing ass. Of course, Laurie always noticed when someone was noticing her, and as per usual, she grinned. "One day, this could be you."

Jackie gulped.

The drive to the frozen yogurt place took only a few minutes, and they didn't feel anywhere near long enough for Jackie. She was still stuffed from breakfast and didn't know how much more her tummy could hold at the moment.

They got out and entered the restaurant. Right away, Jackie felt nervous. The place was full of people already, snacking and slurping away at their cups of frozen yogurt. She couldn't help but notice the heavier folks, and every derogatory remark she'd ever made against a fat person rang through her head, and she began to feel the beginnings of a guilty conscious weighing on her. Somehow, that guilt and shame opened up a new hole in her stomach, almost like she was making some room. This wasn't just a matter of testing Hyde's loyalty. This was also her way of punishing herself for years of snobbery towards these people.

She was jerked out of her thoughts when Laurie tugged at her arm and brought her towards the dispensers. "Okay, the game is simple," she said, grabbing two cups and two spoons. "I got us the 'fixed price' cups, so all you have to do is load up on whatever flavors you want and whatever toppings you desire. Got it?"

Jackie nodded as she took her cup and spoon. She eyed up the dispensers and the labels over them. Good lord, one of them was cake batter flavored. She forced down that teeny bit of snobbery and let the guilt flood through her mind once again. She followed Laurie closely.

Laurie immediately started pouring frozen yogurt of many flavors into her cup. She smiled with glee as several different tastes and smells swirled together, forming a steadily growing mountain of dessert. Jackie followed in suit, getting whatever flavors looked good. Her's wasn't quite as tall as Laurie's, but she was making it as close as she dared. She put lots of rainbow sprinkles on hers before she noticed that Laurie was doing sprinkles, chocolate chips and various candies as well.

Once they were paid for, they sat down at a lone table in a corner. Laurie immediately started eating. She spooned the frozen treat into her gaping maw with such eagerness that Jackie was concerned she would get brain freeze. Steeling her resolve, she started to do likewise. She kept thinking about all the times she'd mocked fat people, and the resulting guilt made her eat faster. She deserved every calorie that clung to her poor little body.

And the flavors - oh god, the flavors. The richness, the thickness, this was what she'd been missing out on. It was all coming together in her brain. The combination of guilt and desire made her eat even faster.

Laurie was about halfway through hers when she saw how fast Jackie was going. She raised her eyebrows, impressed. "Dang, girl, cool your jets. Actually taste it, huh?"

Jackie slowed and looked up like a small child. "Sorry, it's just... oh my god, it's so good," she said sheepishly.

Laurie grinned. "Oh, I hear ya. Just don't hurt yourself."

They continued at a much more reasonable pace for the next few minutes. Soon, the cups were empty, and both girls leaned back. Laurie's belly stretched lazily out into her lap, her growing breasts plopped on either side of it. Jackie, while still tiny in comparison, was much more noticeably bloated than before. They sat there in silence, breathing after their latest onslaught.
13311121121111111111111111.title: Frozen yogurt time!

choices: Time for a break - food coma!
133111211211111111111111111.content:
Thankfully, the trip to Fatso Burger took a bit longer thanks to midday traffic, allowing Jackie to digest her morning meals a bit better. She reclined the seat back a bit and put her hands on her slightly swollen middle. She could feel it gurgle and churn, making her squirm uncomfortably.

Laurie glanced over at her from behind the wheel and smirked. "Feeling better?"

"No," Jackie grumbled. "As far as I'm concerned, we can stay in this car for the rest of the day. Should be enough time for me to finish digest everything you made me eat this morning."

"Pfft! Please. That was nothing. Fatso Burger is just a few minutes away. Hopefully, you'll have made some room in the last half hour."

Jackie winced. She still didn't feel like she could take another bite. But she'd agreed to it. Her determination to tests her boyfriend's devotion was matched by her guilt for fat-shaming people. She heard her stomach gurgle again, and she hoped it was just digestion and not hunger.

All too soon, traffic cleared up and Laurie pulled around the corner to Fatso Burger. She licked her lips at the greasy rundown establishment. It may look like crap from the outside, and the inside wasn't all that attractive either, but the food was excellent. Nice and greasy, just the way her belly liked it.

Pulling into a space, she led the reluctant Jackie through the doors and inside. Staring across at the minimum wage lackeys behind the counter, she sauntered over and smiled winningly at them.

"Welcome to Fatso Burger. How may I serve you?" the teenage loser intoned lifelessly.

"I'll have the Fatso Combo Number 2, with fries and a chocolate shake," Laurie said brightly before turning to Jackie, motioning for her to step forward.

Jackie gulped and eyed the menu. She saw the look in the other girl's eye. She knew she wouldn't allow her to order anything much smaller than her. She steeled her resolve and dove in.

"I'll have the Fatso Combo Number 2, no onions, no tomatoes, fries, vanilla shake," she said, squeezing her eyes shut in case her brain exploded from the very thought of more food.

Thankfully, no such event took place. They paid for their food, and soon, they were sitting at a table and eating.

"Love a table," Laurie sighed happily. "Room to grow."

Jackie nodded listlessly as she took out the double cheeseburger. Good god, it was huge. How was she supposed to cram all of this into her tiny body? And all those fries? And the medium shake?

In fact, how was Laurie doing this? The older woman was eagerly tucking into the burger, letting the juice drip off onto the wrapper. She was dipping her fries into the shake. She showed no signs of pain.

"Where do you put it all?" Jackie asked, still nervously holding her burger. "How do you still have room?"

Laurie raised an eyebrow. "Who says I have room?" she sneered. "I probably only had enough room left for a small fry."

"Then how can you push yourself like this? How can you be eating all of that?"

"Oh, sweetie, trust me. There's always more room. Trust me. You'd be amazed what your stomach can handle. I mean, I've had more experience stretching it to its limits these past few months, but you'll get there."

Jackie nodded before looking down at the burger again. Still huge. But it smelled terrific. And it looked delicious with all that melted cheese.

She took that first bite, and it was like fireworks exploding in her brain - absolutely amazing.

Laurie watched a strange sense of pride as Jackie took another bite. Then a few more, and then some fries, and then a sip of her shake, and then some fries in the shake, and then back to the burger. Slowly at first, but then a bit faster the more she had. She worked diligently at the meal, clearly dead set on finishing it. She ate with all her might. It was inspiring.

All too soon, though, it came to an end. Laurie finished her own lunch in record time. Everything went into her belly, and she leaned back in her seat, her legs spread apart, and her belly peeking out from under her sweater. She sipped absently on what was left of her shake while Jackie continued to work at her meal.

Jackie had slowed down again as the effects of her daylong feast began to catch up with her. She was undeniably full now. Filled to the brim. Barely any room left at all. But she was still working on it. Just a few bites of burger left. Only a few fries. Still half a milkshake, but that could be worked on. She nibbled and chewed, looking incredibly tired. One hand left her burger and placed itself upon her cute little belly. That dress had been pretty form-fitting when she left the house. Now she was starting to look pregnant. She leaned back in her seat and placed her hand atop it. Yes, it looked like she was carrying a smallish basketball under her dress.

It was a long time getting those last few bites down, but at last, Jackie managed it. The burger was gone. The fries were gone. She noisily slurped up what was left of the shake. She slumped back in her chair, utterly and completely stuffed.

Laurie smiled lazily, her hands resting atop her own belly. "Was it good?" she asked.

Jackie opened her mouth to reply, only to be taken by surprise when a huge gas bubble found an exit path and caused her to release a huge belch that echoed throughout the restaurant, causing a few patrons to stop and look. Her face went beet red as her hand went to her mouth in humiliation.

Laurie was just as startled as anyone, but she couldn't help but giggle. "An angel just got its wings!"

It was such a weird thing to say that Jackie felt a small smile split her face, and she snorted a small giggle through her nose.

Soon, both girls were laughing at the whole incident. It was like all the tension just melted away, and they were just two friends enjoying a day out.

"So, that was a 'yes', right? It was good?"

Jackie caught her breath. "Yeah, it was good...," she said. "God, I am soooooo stuffed. I don't know how I did it."

Laurie smiled. "I'm so proud. Now come on, kid. Let's move on."

That was easier said than done. The effects of their gorge were catching up with both of them now, and Laurie found standing a bit difficult. Shrugging off the food coma for just a while, she got to her feet, arching her back so her belly stuck out a little bit - she wanted it right in Jackie's face.

Jackie dazedly stared up at the pale orb that peeked out from beneath the patterned sweater. It was mere inches from her. All that fat and flab. That navel that went way deeper than it should have. The purple stretches marks that encircled it like rippled in a lake. Her thoughts briefly returned to her boyfriend. Could Steven really still love her with a stomach like that? A stomach so big it looked like she'd swallowed a basketball? She really hoped so. She didn't want to lose him. But if he only loved her for being thin and conventionally attractive, then was he even worth hanging onto?

She noticed that Laurie was offering her a hand. "Need help getting up?"

Jackie stared at that hand for a moment before taking it. "Thanks."
133111211211111111111111111.title: Time for lunch - Fatso Burger!

1331112112111111111111111111.content:
Throughout the entire car ride, Jackie's hands cradled her stuffed stomach. It bulged so badly she was certain she would bust at some point. Her poor dress was so strained, she was worried breathing too deeply would pop a stitch or three. She couldn't muffle a moan that escaped from her lips as the car rounded a corner, causing her contents to slosh around.

"Unnnnnnnnnnngh...!"

Laurie nodded. "I hear ya," she agreed, steering with one hand and clutching her gut with the other.

"Where are we going now? Are we going to the buffet to finish ourselves off?"

"Nope," Laurie replied, turning again, this time into a driveway. "Now we're going to kick back and relax a bit."

Jackie sat up in the reclined seat and looked around. She saw they were in the Formans' driveway. She'd been so dazed, she hadn't noticed.

The two women heaved themselves out of the car and waddled inside. They saw Kitty was at the kitchen counter, cleaning away. She smiled brightly when the two girls entered.

"Well, there you girls are!" she chirped. "Was wondering why it was quiet! Where've you been?"

Laurie attempted a bright fake smile but was too tired for the required energy. "Oh, you know!" she said. "Just lunch. Girl talk. Stuff like that. Right, Jackie?"

Jackie fought to hold down another belch. "Yeah, we -hic!- just had lunch together."

"Well, that's just wonderful! I'm so glad to see you girls getting along! Jackie, will you be staying for dinner tonight?"

Jackie tried not to look too ill. She glanced at Laurie, who raised an eyebrow. "Yes. Yes, I will."

"Oh, wonderful! You know, when Eric left for college, I thought this house would just feel so empty. It's such a relief that you kids are stilling around, but don't tell Red I said that, okay? Ha ha ha ha ha!"

"That's great, mom," Laurie said, trying to hold down a belch of her own. "We're just going to hang out in my room for a bit."

"You go right ahead, dear," Kitty smiled. "I'll let you know when dinner's ready."

Relieved, Laurie and Jackie scurried past her and upstairs, into Laurie's room. They shut the door and sighed heavily.

"Oh my god, your mom can talk," Jackie moaned.

"I know," Laurie groaned, heading for the bed. "I swear, she can turn a two minute conversation into six years." She collapsed flat on her back, causing her belly to jiggle and wobble furiously, and also causing her too-tight sweater to ride up, exposing the great orb in all its splendor.

Jackie stared blankly at the sight. The bloated blonde was sprawled out on the bed, legs draped over the side, and her massive gut sticking out and over the waistband of her stretch pants. She watched as it rose and fell with ever labored breath. She bit her lip and slowly approached. "... You okay?" she asked, hovering over her.

Laurie peered up at her, causing her subtle double chin to be very much less-than-subtle. She smiled, showing just how full her face had become. "Better than okay, kid," she said. "I'm frikkin' stuffed! I should've invited you for a town-wide gorge a long time ago. This is the best I've eaten in a long time."

And she let out that belch she'd been fighting back, letting it rip across the room with such a ferocity that it seemed to shake the windows. At the very least, it made Jackie jump back in fright. Relieved, she let out a sigh and began rubbing her exposed belly, a cheerful look on her face.

Jackie couldn't help but be a bit envious. Not necessarily of Laurie's weight, but of how content she looked. From the offset, she looked like a beached whale. To stuffed and bloated to move. But she saw the look of utter contentment, the absolute pleasure, and she wondered if at any point in her life, she'd ever been that satisfied. Hell, she wasn't all that certain that sex had made her that satisfied.

The effects of the day's gorge caught up with her again, and she clutched her increasingly sore middle. "I ate too much...," she whined.

Laurie mock-pouted. "Awwww, poor baby! Come lie down!" She patted the space on the bed beside her.

Jackie nodded and laid out on the bed, similar to how Laurie was doing.

"And now just lie there and rub that poor little tummy," Laurie continued.

Jackie did so, silently rubbing her stomach.

"And just drift off into a deep sleep so that all that food can become nice thick glorious fat..."

Jackie's eyes widened at instinctual horror. She peered down (or up) at her round belly, still gurgling as it digested, and she felt a feeling that she was on the precipice. She'd been wrestling with it all day - to gain weight and see what happened, or to stay thin and, therefore, within her comfort zone. The massive part of her brain that was a shallow high school girl told her to stay comfortable.

But that other slowly-growing part of her brain was telling her to ride it out. That a few extra pounds were no big deal. That she could lose the weight if she really wanted to. That today had been one of the most satisfying days of her life as she'd finally tossed out the cheerleader diet and made a proper pig of herself. She wasn't sure if she would ever find it sexually appealing like Laurie, but then, Laurie found a lot of things sexually appealing. Hell, maybe that was part of it. Now that she'd settled down and stayed with Fez, she had to channel that massive sex drive into something else, and that something else turned out to be food and gaining weight.

Jackie observed her stomach again. She wasn't sure what she felt at the moment - too many conflicting emotions for that - but for now, she'd had a really good day, and the dull pain in her belly had been slowly replaced by a great comfortable fullness that was making her eyelids very heavy.

She glanced across to Laurie, only to find the older woman had dozed off, hands fallen to the sides of her gut as it rose and fell with every soft snore. Deciding that was a very sensible idea right now, Jackie pulled herself up all the way onto the bed and got a pillow to rest on. She rolled onto her side, feel the day's feast shift within her belly. Unable to help her curiosity, she lifted her dress up a little to observe just how big her stomach actually was. She saw how it poked out, clearly swollen from her gorge. She ran a hand over the bare skin and shivered. It was so taut. So stretched. And it was... nice.

With her hand still on her belly, she let her eyelids slide shut, and she joined Laurie in their food coma.
1331112112111111111111111111.title: Time for a break - food coma!
