13311121121111111111111111111.content:
Laurie had drifted off at some point during the thirty seconds between lying down on the bed and cradling her stuffed gut. Her head lolled over and her hands flopped at her sides, and she twitched slightly as she dozed.

* * * * *

Laurie woke up in the middle of a large dimly-lit room. She saw that it was dim because it was only lit with candles on tall metal stand and plinths. From what she could make out, it was a gothic-themed room, with bricks and stone floors and gargoyles leering at her from the walls. She blinked her eyesight better, finding that it was a chair. It was a large wooden chair with a cushioned seat and back with nice sturdy armrests, and it was at the end of a long dining table. What confused her was that this was the only chair in the room.

She heard footsteps from the shadows, and into the light stepped Fez. Except it wasn't quite Fez. The usual warmth and cheery persona seemed to have been replaced by something far more... sinister. He peered up from beneath his lowered brow and smiled in her direction. "Laurie, my love...," he whispered.

"Fez...?" she asked, feeling a tiny bit afraid. "Where are we?"

"Where you most desire, my dear," he replied. "As your husband, it is my duty to bring you love and pleasure. Tonight... I am all about pleasure..."

Laurie raised an eyebrow. "Oh, are you?" she asked. She knew sometimes Fez tried to sound badass when trying to seduce her, which tended to be eye-roll-worthy yet still amusing enough to at least be cute. Now, she actually believed he was capable of what he said. "And... how do you intend to pleasure me?"

Fez gestured to the lone chair at the end of the table. "Have a seat."

She knew something was going on. Swallowing, she approached it, checked it over a few times, and then sat down, pleased to find that at least it was comfortable. She scooted her cushioned ass to the cushioned seat and settled down, leaning back and putting her hands upon the hand rest.

Fez crouched down so he was eye level with her. "You trust me, don't you, my love?" he asked, still as wicked as before.

Laurie looked at him, intrigued. "... Yes."

Fez smiled. "Good."

There was a clicking sound, and Laurie was taken off guard by some plastic clamps that suddenly seemed to appear from nowhere and restrain her wrists to the chair. She let out a yelp and struggled to get away, but it was too late. She was trapped. "Dammit! What the hell, Fez?!"

But Fez simply put a finger to her lips, somehow silencing her instantly. "Shhhhhh...," he soothed. "Do not panic, my darling. I am here to pleasure you. And I do hope it is... pleasurable." He began to giggle at his 'joke'.

Eye roll time.

Suddenly, the laughter stopped, and Fez clapped his hands twice.

For a moment, nothing.

Then... Laurie saw that something had appeared on the table in front of her. To her amazement, it was a full banquet. Plates and platters, all crammed with food. All kinds of food. Every single food group was represented in some way.

"Fez...," she breathed, hit by the aroma. "How...?!"

Fez patted her shoulder. "You've been a naughty little piggly wiggly, Laurie," he teased. "Now... it's time for you to face punishment for your gluttonous ways. And I shall administer that punishment now."

Laurie could already feel herself becoming turned on at the very thought. "Ohhh, Fez...," she hissed, wishing she had a hand free to at least reach down and take care of this problem. "Punish the fuck outta me..."

Fez smiled and picked up a large turkey leg to Laurie's face. Without any direction, she bit into it, chewing it, loving it. The meat, the juice, the smell, the everything. She let out a moan of pleasure and bit into it again. "So good...," she sighed.

"Ah, ah, ahhhh," Fez scolded. "No talking with your mouthful. Such a naughty little piggy."

"Oink, oink," she replied, before resuming her consumption, and in a few seconds, the meat was gone, and Fez was holding a bare bone.

He tossed it aside and grabbed a hotdog with all the trimmings. There seemed to be a whole plate of them. She opened her mouth wide and allowed it to be shoved entirely into her mouth. She didn't even have to chew this time. She just swallowed it whole, feeling it slide down her throat and into her stomach. Then came all the others - each one shoved whole down her throat.

Then Fez presented her with a line of sausage links. Licking her lips, she allowed the first one to be placed in her mouth, and then she started sucking them down like a spaghetti noodle. For a while, she wasn't sure she could do it. There were just so many. But she determinedly sucked them all down into her gut in one single, albeit prolonged, breath. She sighed rapturously in her seat and leaned back.

Next up was a tray of hamburgers. Fez took them and hurled each one like a frisbee. Instinctively, she moved her head in each direction the burger flew, catching each one in her mouth and gulping it down. She didn't even bother with tasting right now. She just wanted to swallow them all down into her belly.

Once all twenty of those were gone, Fez tossed the tray away and walked over to her, patting her belly, which had doubled in size during that particular gorge. "My, my, you're such a little fatty, aren't you, Laurie?"

Laurie whimpered at the touch. "Oh, I am, Fezzie," she moaned. "I'm such a huge hungry fatass. My belly is super-full. Oh god... Don't stop..."

Fez smirked. "It will never stop, my dear. Never."

He snapped his fingers, and to Laurie's surprise, all the plates in the room began to rise up, hovering unsteadily above the long table. She gaped at the sight. There was still so much to finish. They all started floating towards her, circling her from all directions, and each bit of food then rose off its plate and into her mouth.

Some sandwiches forced their way in. Some bananas unpeeled and launched themselves like torpedoes down her throat. A large bag of popcorn fired like artillery until it was emptied. A plate of fresh chocolate chip cookies paraded single file into her mouth. An entire ice cream sundae dropped from the ceiling into her upturned mouth, splattering everywhere, but mostly inside her stomach.

Speaking of which, her stomach was still slowly growing. Now even larger, Laurie realized it was so big she was having trouble seeing over it. It stretched and grew, wider and higher. She heard a loud splintering crack, and the chair's armrests suddenly burst off, freeing her hands. Rather than escape, however, she settled for rubbing the gigantic swell of a belly in her lap. She re-positioned herself. so that she could see into the room around her, and she found when she hunched over, it rest on the ground.

Fez tutted. "Dearie me, that was an antique. You naughty little piggy."

Laurie panted as she hefted the humongous belly beneath her, leaning closer to the table. "I am, Fez. So naughty. Oh god, I need more. I want to be bigger. So much fatter."

Out of nowhere, a long straw suddenly stuck itself in her mouth.

"Your wish is my command," Fez replied, gesturing to a huge keg of beer that had just materialized nearby.

Laurie's eyes widened as beer suddenly started flowing into her stomach. She could feel herself blowing up like a waterbed, listening to it swish and gush inside her. Her stomach stretched and groaned as it grew in size, and to her alarm, her feet were lifted off the ground as it grew large enough for her to rest on top of it. It bounced like a rubber ball, and as it grew, she rose higher, but she held onto the straw for dear life, practically crying out for more as she guzzled all that she could from the seemingly endless stream of beer.

Then, she saw something front of her that made her stop. It was a large chocolate layer cake, sitting all by its widdle wonesome on the table, just in front of her.

"Ohhhh...," Laurie purred. "Come here, you sexy thing..."

Tossing the straw aside, she kicked and rolled over, listening to her stomach slosh and gurgle beneath her. She allowed herself to roll back a bit so her feet touched the ground just long enough to force herself forward. Once close enough, she kicked her feet off the floor again and rolled forward, only to fall face first into the cake with a splat. Rather than grumble, she simply started eating. She grabbed the cake with both hands and ate that cake as fast as she could. She grabbed huge chunks and stuffed them in her mouth.

All too soon, it was done. The cake was eaten. She dusted her chocolate-smeared face and licked her hands clean. "Ohhhhhhh," she groaned.

She felt someone grab her back and found herself roll backwards a bit, away from the table. She groggily looked ahead at Fez, and now, instead of the sinister fellow he'd been at the beginning, he was now warm and loving again. "Hello, my little beluga whale," he said sweetly. "Are you feeling full yet?"

Laurie looked at him for a long moment before a small smile split her chocolate-stained lips. "... Never..."

He leaned in close. "That's my piggy."

Her lips met his, and she leaned into him. He placed his hands upon her enormous belly, as did she. Four hands, all rubbing that enormous orb she was mounted upon. Totally immobile. Totally helpless. Totally happy.

* * * * * *

Jackie stirred and woke up, finding herself with her dress up over her rounded tummy on Laurie's bed. Lowering it down again, she glanced around and saw Laurie was still where she was. But now, to her surprise, she Laurie's hand had disappeared down the front of her pants, and she had an impish little smile on her face, and she seemed to be groaning Fez's name.

Blushing bright red, Jackie quickly got up and fled the room. Best let her have her dream for now.
13311121121111111111111111111.title: Meanwhile, Laurie's dreaming...

133111211211111111111111111111.content:
When Laurie awoke, she was sorely disappointed, although she had to admit - she was glad she could actually move in the real world. She looked around the room and found she was alone. Jackie must've gone to do something. She better not have left the house, she thought grumpily. With a considerable grunt, she rolled herself into a sitting position, looking at the round belly sitting in her lap. Not as big as in the dream, obviously. In fact, with the dream in her mind, she looked downright skinny. But she placed her hands on either side and playfully slapped it, smiling faintly. Maybe someday...

She glanced at the clock and was surprised it was now almost evening. She sniffed the air, and immediately, she was picking up the scent of dinner being made. She stepped out of her room and scurried down the stairs, jiggling the whole way. She arrived in the kitchen just as Kitty was carrying some plates to the dining room.

"Oh, Laurie! Good! Can you give me a hand with some of these?"

Laurie's eyes were blazing at the sight. Ham, veggies, corn, mashed potatoes... It all looked so good. And there seemed to be enough to feed a small army.

Or me, she thought to herself.

She carried some plates into the dining room, where Red, Hyde and Jackie were all sitting. Good, Jackie was staying after all. She smiled sweetly at her, which was replied by a small awkward smile and little eye contact. Undeterred, Laurie set the dishes down and sat opposite the couple while Red and Kitty were at either end. She plopped her considerable rump into her seat and joined in.

"So I heard from Eric," Kitty said enthusiastically. "He says he's looking into the university's teaching program! Isn't that exciting?"

"Sure," Laurie said as she started shifting food onto her plate. "They say those that can't do, teach. And there's just so much that he can't do, he'd be a natural."

This elicited a few snickers from around the table, but Kitty frowned. "Now Laurie, be nice. Your brother's finding some direction in his life."

"And for once, it's not to a sci-fi convention," Red added. "God, that better not be what he teaches. Imagine a whole class devoted to that Star Wars crap."

"Oh, Red, come off it," Kitty scolded playfully. "You liked Star Wars when you saw it."

Hyde, Jackie and Laurie all looked at him, surprised amusement on their faces.

"Is that so?" Hyde asked, raising an eyebrow.

"Oh, I did not. I just liked the explosions."

"Like father, like son..."

"Awww, Mr Forman, that's so sweet," Jackie said.

Red rolled his eyes and began moaning about having "too many dumbasses" in his house.

While all this was going on, Laurie made eye contact with Jackie, and dropped the subtle hint that she was supposed to be eating.

Jackie sighed and began to ladle food onto her plate. She knew she would have to match Laurie's amount, which was still growing at the moment. They both piled their plates high until they had matching enormous piles. She wasn't stuffed like she was earlier, but she wasn't exactly starving either. She winced as she wondered what Hyde must be thinking right now. God, he probably thought she was such a pig.

But Hyde wasn't saying anything. He just went about his dinner, chatting with the Formans, throwing in whenever he had a sarcastic quip to give or some social commentary to expel. He didn't seem to notice that his girlfriend had loaded her plate with at least a pound of Mrs. Forman's cooking.

Taking a deep breath to settle her nerves, she began to eat. It was such a relief to be eating something homecooked instead of that greasy takeout. It hadn't been bad, but it made her feel less ill. Real food. Actual food. Cooked food. You couldn't beat it. She found eating it much easier than eating at Fatso Burger. She was pleased to find that this was a meal she didn't really mind having too much of.

Laurie, of course, didn't care what the food was. As long as she was eating, she was satisfied. She shoveled food into her mouth without giving it much thought. She couldn't help but draw parallels between this and her former sex life. She'd had sex with any guy set in front of her, not caring anything about them except their package size. Just sex and then move onto the next one. And that's how she was at meal time. Just eat and move on to the next one. Smiling at the very thought, she continued eating. This was probably healthier in the long run anyway, right?

The evening continued as everyone finished dinner. Laurie and Jackie stuffed themselves silly and were soon leaning back with protruding bellies and contented looks on their faces.

"My, my!" Kitty said, taking away the dishes. "Hardly any leftovers! I'll have to make this more often! Aha ha ha ha!"

Red kissed on her the cheek. "Excellent dinner, Kitty," he said. "I'm going to my chair for a bit."

The adults departed, and Hyde got his sunglasses back out. "Time to go downstairs and watch Hawaii 5-0. You in, Jackie?"

Jackie nodded sleepily. "Only if you don't mind me falling asleep on you," she replied.

Hyde grinned. "Sounds good to me."

He stood and, without saying a word, helped Jackie to her feet. Laurie caught a glimpse of her stomach as she stood. Lord, how it bulged. After a day like today, of course it would. She looked pregnant in that skin-tight dress. She was impressed she hadn't popped a stitch.

Jackie caught sight of Laurie smirking at her and nodded. She needed to lie down and digest this mound of a belly.

Laurie got up from the table and groaned at the feeling of fullness. God, it was hard to remember a time when she wasn't stuffed in some way. She waddled off back to bed for another food coma. She still remembered her dream and smiled, hoping that maybe she could live through it again.

However, just as she was getting comfy, the door suddenly opened, and in walked Fez with a few bags in his arms. "Good evening, my lovely! I am home!" he announced cheerfully.

Laurie smiled sleepily at him. "Oh hey, hubby," she said, lying back on the bed. "How was work?"

"Oh, it was fine. I brought home leftovers."

"Ooooh, Laurie like! Whatcha got?"

"Some pork chops, some cherry pie...," Fez pulled out a familiar bottle, "... and your favorite ranch dressing."

"Oh, Fezzie, you know how to treat a girl right!"

"Only the best for you, my angel."

Laurie practically swooned. It wasn't just that he said those things. It was that he actually meant them. The sincerity alone was enough to make her heart go all a-flutter. She took the bottle from him, unscrewed the top and immediately began to chug it. After a few hearty swallows, she lowered it and licked the remnants off her lips. "Mmmmm, ranchy."
133111211211111111111111111111.title: It's time for dinner!

1331112112111111111111111111111.content:
Jackie had a lovely evening with her Steven, snuggled up on the ratty old basement couch, watching old TV together. Of course, she made good on her promise to fall asleep, where she ended up staying for a few hours. She was awoken a bit later when the last late evening drama ended, and he'd nudged her awake, letting her know that if they wanted to have any sex, they ought to have it now. Sadly, she was still too full, not too mention sleepy as hell, and she also had school to go back to the next day. High school only had a few months left, and she wanted to graduate on time. He was naturally opposed to her going to high school and get her head filled with "government-mandated facts", but of course, he was a gentleman and accepted her desire, so they settled for a nice make out session before she said goodnight and headed home.

She still lived at the Pinciotti house, even though Donna had long-since moved away. Bob was a very accommodating host, although things had gotten weird since he and Joanne had gotten back together. She liked Joanne fine, but she was practically living with them now, and there were times when she could hear... noises... from the next bedroom. Shuddering to herself, she walked into the house, finding the kitchen empty. She did, however, notice a note on the fridge. Apparently, it was Bob's turn to stay over at Joanne's, but he said he'd made her lunch for school tomorrow. She smiled - it was nice to have a parent who actually cared. Her parents had been very distant in the caring department, often just throwing money at her to make her happy.

With that unhappy thought, she turned towards the fridge and gave it a long look. Should she get something to eat? Maybe just some juice...

She noticed her reflection in the window. Her belly still poked out under her dress. Clearly, she wasn't done digesting today's utter onslaught. God, she'd made a pig of herself.

The fridge continued to stand there, taunting her. After a moment, she finally gave in and peered inside. She smiled at a huge dish of macaroni and cheese that was just begging to be snacked on. Delighted, she grabbed a spoon, took the dish and skipped into the living room to watch some TV. Carson was just coming on. She had time to at least watch the monologue, a sketch and maybe some of the first guest, depending on who it was.

The mac n cheese was cold, but she didn't mind. It was delicious no matter what. Clearly, it had been made recently. She snacked away on it, enjoying the show and relaxing a lot. She couldn't help smiling a bit as she thought about her night with Steven. So far, he hadn't been grossed out by the amount she ate or how round her stomach was afterwards. Still, it was only the beginning. It was still too early to tell what his ultimate reaction would be. Just thinking about it made her unconsciously eat faster. By the time the monologue was over, she was surprised to find that she'd already eaten half its contents.

Startled by how much she'd just put away in a few minutes, she figured maybe it was time to stop eating. She took it back to the fridge, only to then let her eyes fall upon the freezer door. Unable to resist, she popped it open and saw there were a few frozen sweets inside - specifically, ice cream. Rocky Road, Cookie Dough, Strawberry... There were so many, surely Bob wouldn't mind if she took one. She nabbed the Strawberry - figuring he'd be less annoyed by that - and started eating it with her spoon.

She was halfway through the pint when she once again caught sight of herself in the window reflection, and she stopped. She looked at herself, spoon halfway to her mouth, belly protruding outwards like she was pregnant... She quietly put the lid back on the carton and put it back in the freezer, feeling oddly embarrassed.

She decided to go upstairs and get ready for bed. She got out of that too-tight dress and into a big t-shirt. She was just brushing her hair in front of the mirror when she caught sight of some of the pillows lying on top of her bed. She had loads of pillows. She could never understand Donna only having the one. Decoration was important - even on the bed. She looked at them all with their varying shapes and sizes. Then she looked down at the roomy t-shirt she had on, feeling curious.

She nabbed one of the smaller pillows and tucked it under her shirt, slipping into a pair of flannel pajama bottoms as well to support it. She posed a bit before the mirror, like a runway model. It wasn't the most natural shape, so it didn't really present an accurate representation of a fat belly. So she pulled it out and studied them all. She settled on her usual bed pillow - long, fluffy and rectangular. First, she had to figure out how to wear it. She tried vertically, but from straight on, she didn't look any wider. So she turned it horizontally so it wrapped around her middle. That looked more accurate. She posed back and forth around the room - hands on hips, hands on tummy, back arched, etc. All the standard poses.

The one thing she couldn't help noticing was that she still looked cute. In fact, she looked damn cute. Somehow, even with a wider frame, she still looked like Jackie Burkhart - just a Jackie Burkhart with a big belly. She patted it, starting to like it.

Sadly, her eyes then fell on the clock, and she saw it was getting late. She needed to be up and ready in time for school. With some reluctance, she pulled the pillow out from under her shirt and put it back on the bed, getting under the covers. She drifted off to sleep thinking that maybe being a bit fatter wouldn't be so bad after all.
1331112112111111111111111111111.title: Meanwhile, Jackie heads home
