155332222222222222222222222221111.content:
The past few weeks had been very hard on the mother of dragons, and what remained of her loyal followers. Following the death of her love and king Drogo, the vast majority of the Dothraki tribe abandoned her (as was there nature). What remained was a rag tag group of the sick and weak, mostly women though a few Dothraki warriors remained, their loyalty absolute despite the death of Khal Drogo. The main support she had was from her most trusted advisor Ser Jorah Mormont, who had proved himself time and again even when things appeared hopelessly bleak. But even Ser Jorahs counsel couldn't disguise bleak things were, as now they were wondering alone in the vast deserts of the Red Waste, without food or water. It was at this moment when two of her followers returned to her on horseback, having been sent to scout ahead of any settlements.

"What news do you have?" Asked Princess Daenerys Targaryan in the rough tongue of the Dothraki.

"My Queen" Replied one, inclining his head slightly "We found a large walked city... A days walk"

Daenerys tried to hide her relief at the words, trying to forget that at several points she had thought that they would all perish.

"My sun and stars, this news is most welcome" She said.

"That is if they allow us entrance Khaleesi" Said Ser Jorah "Most cities do not simply open their doors to a tribe of Dothraki"

"I know this Jorah" Replied Daenerys "But this is not a normal tribe of Dothraki... For this one is lead by the Mother of Dragons! The rightful ruler of all these lands!"

Ser Jorah merely smiled, his admiration and love for the beautiful Princess barely in check. It was a hard days ride across the unforgiving desert, but finally the image of a huge walled city became visible on the shimmering horizon. As they drew closer to the magnificent city however, the tribe noticed that their approach had not give unnoticed. A large army of at least a thousand men were stood in front of the walls, ready to meet Daenerys and her Dothraki followers. Daenerys forced herself to show no fear as she and her followers stopped some hundred feet from the intimidating ranks of heavily armoured soldiers, though Ser Jorah certainly seemed tense. In front of the soldiers stood thirteen robed men, who Daenerys note focused her attention on ignoring the army behind them.

"My name is Princess Daenerys Stormborn of house Targaryan... Mother of Dragons!" She said loudly enough for all present to here "The rightful heir to the throne. I and my people require refuge, and ships to reach Kings Landing. If you provide this you will be rewarded beyond your wildest dreams!"

What happens next?
155332222222222222222222222221111.title: Wandering the Red Waste

choices: She has to allow the people of Qarth to fatten her up during her stay
1553322222222222222222222222211111.content:
There was a silence as the small, pretty (yet commanding) young blondes speech sunk in to those listening, and soon thirteen men stood forward from the intimidating army that blocked the city.

"Hello Mother of Dragons" Said a plump, clearly very wealthy man if his clothes and jewellery were anything to go by "You may call me the Spice King, as I have doubts that you will be able to pronounce my true name... I am a member of The Thirteen of Qarth who, together with my other twelve companions govern the grand city you currently stand before"

Daenerys steeled herself, fully aware that already this man was patronising her.

"I am delighted to meet you.. Spice King, and all of your companions" She said, choosing her words carefully "The legend of Qarth is well known, and i would be honoured if you would allow us access to your illustrious city"

"Yes I have no doubt that you would" Said the man, his tone infuriating "But I hope you can understand the reputation of the men you lead is also well known... Why would we allow such men into or home?"

"Because I lead them" She replied simply "My word is iron, and you have my word nothing will become of your city if you accept us inside"

"But all I have is your word that YOUR word is iron" Said The Spice King unimpressed by Daenerys claim "I don't know you. All I know is who your father was... And that is not something which will strengthen your argument or gain you any trust or loyalty here"

The band of Dothraki and the young blondes back stiffened noticeably, obviously aware of the disrespect being shown to their leader. They were horrendously outnumbered, but that did not matter to them and this was seemingly picked up by The Spice King who shrank back a little. They were then approached by another member of the thirteen; a tall black man, with an expression that worked against his intimidating stature.

"I will take responsibility for her" Said the man simply.

"You?" The Spice King almost spat "For her and her band of pillaging Dothraki?"

"Yes" Replied the man, removing a large ceremonial dagger from the waistband of his tunic "You have my word that nothing will become of Qarth while they reside here"

The man then flashed the dagger across his palm, producing a deep cut along it to strengthen his promise.

"Very well" Said The Spice King, clearly unhappy "But on your head be it. And to you Queen of Dragons I will say, during your stay here you will abide by our rules, and you will sign a contact to the same effect... If you refuse any of our demands and rules you will be cast out... Back to the Red Waste from whence you came"

The fat little man now stalked away from Daenerys, back to his fellow Thirteen. The dark skinned man now approached Daenerys.

"Greetings Daenerys Stormborn, welcome to Qarth" He said, his voice deep yet calming "My name is Xaro Xhoan Daxos"

------------------

"Why are you doing this?" Asked Daenerys as she walked with Xaro into Qarth, smiling though not hiding her suspicion.

"I like you" He said simply "I can tell you have something, that is not commonly found in Qarth"

Daenerys was no fool, she didn't trust the man but without his help she would surely perish on the the desolate plains of the Red Waste. Under Xaro's guidance Daenerys looked over the documents The Thirteen expected her to sign to gain entrance to the city for her people. There was a lot in it which used Quartheen terms and expressions which she was unfamiliar with, so Xaro had to explain them. This was all fine until they reached one paragraph in particular.

What does it say?
1553322222222222222222222222211111.title: The conditions of Qarth

choices: Daenerys is invited to a gathering of the most influential citizens of Qarth
Daenerys behind formulating a plan to leave Qarth
15533222222222222222222222222111111.content:
"What does this mean?" Inquired Daenerys, her eyebrow raised slightly as she scrutinised the wording of one paragraph in particular.

"That... Well..." Began Xaro, his calm demeanour stumbling briefly as he clearly tried to find the right words.

"That means that while you stay in our fabled city you will be unable to refuse a meal" Replied The Spice King, clearly overjoyed to be the one to explain "You will be approached many times a day, by citizens and noblemen alike, who will feed you whatever food is at hand... And you will consume whatever you are given, or our deal is over and you will banished from the city"

There was a stunned, uncomfortable silence as Daenerys came to terms with this outrageous request.

"What madness is this Xaro?" She demanded finally, her voice shaking.

"It is... A custom of Qarth I'm afraid" He answered gravely "Women who are granted guest rites to our city are ceremonially fattened up, as a sign of the generosity and great wealth of the city"

"I have other women with me" Growled Daenerys "Why am I the only one to be subjected to this"

"Technically you are the only person to be granted guest rites by us" He said "The others are guests of yours"

Daenerys turned to Jorah, trying not to show her dismay and panic infront of everybody present.

"Jorah" She said quietly, her eyes betraying her emotions to him "This is madness... I cannot agree to this"

"Easy Khaleesi" He answered softly "We need these people and the city for the moment... Any weight you gain here can be lost again, but our losses if we are sent back onto the Red Waste cannot be regained"

Daenerys took a deep breath, trying to calm her nerves and frustration before picking up the quill to sign the parchment. She knew she had no choice, the needs of her people were too great.

"Excellent" Said The Spice King, an unpleasant smile on his face "Welcome to Qarth, Queen of Dragons"

---------------------

After the signing, Daenerys band of Dothraki were lead to rooms where they would be staying during their time on Qarth. Jorah remained at Daenerys side and together they took a walk around the grounds near their own personal quarters. The city of Qarth was truly an astonishing place, fully deserving of all the legends and stories Daenerys had heard as a child. Every single structure seemed designed to exemplify the cities enormous wealth, as every building was an example of the highest levels of architecture, scale and grandeur.

"Its quite a city" Commented Daenerys, playing down her awe.

"It is more lavish than anywhere in Westeros, even Kings Landing" Jorah replied "With walls to protect them and no other civilisation for hundreds of miles, they have not needed to fight any real wars here... They have just lived off the vast wealth generated at their harbours"

As they walked along a path flanked both sides by beautiful plants and trees they were approached by two women, both dressed in very elegant clothing and carrying large wicker baskets. At first Daenerys frowned at them, but then upon seeing food in the baskets they carried she merely sighed to herself.

"Fine" She said impatiently "Just get it over with"

The women bowed their heads before each reaching into their baskets and removing some Qartheen delicacies. Jorah looked embarrassed, clearly unsure of where to look as the women began feeding Daenerys right there. The food was very rich and flavourful, and Daenerys could tell it was most likely rather fattening and made with expensive ingredients. As the womens baskets were emptied Daenerys was surprised just how much they expected her to eat, granted she was rather hungry from wandering the Red Waste, but she was satisfied awhile ago and yet the food kept coming. Finally she chewed and swallowed the last of what the women had, and stifled a small hiccough as she felt her stomach bulge slightly from the meal.

"Thank you Khaleesi" Said the women in unison, giving a deep bow before walking away.

"How was it Khaleesi?" Asked Jorah.

"Fine I suppose" She replied, stifling a burp "I haven't eaten that well for a long time... I just wonder how often I'm going to be expected to eat like that"

She didn't have to wait long for the answer, for as she and Jorah reached the end of the path they were greeted by a tall, olive skinned man.

"For you Khaleesi" He said opening the lid of a box he carried allowing steam to rise from within "Specially baked today"

Daenerys groaned, clearly quite full already but following a look from Jorah she merely sighed.

"Very well" She said wearily.

The man began piling the sweet tasting selection of delicate pastries into the Princesses mouth, who had no choice but to begrudgingly accept them. Daenerys tiny frame and stature was not used to the sheer volume of food she was already being forced to eat, and she wondered grimly how she was going to make it through one day of it let alone the amount of time it would take to devise the next plan of action for her and her people.

What happens next?
15533222222222222222222222222111111.title: Daenerys feeding fate

choices: They have a surprise for Daenerys
Daenerys is approached by a strange man
155332222222222222222222222221111111.content:
Later that day, after numerous feedings, Daenerys and Jorah were approached again by the Spice King and his ensemble of noble men and women. He was amused at the sight of the once so proud princess stumbling along, her clearly stuffed belly causing her some discomfort.

"Greetings Khaleesi" He said, making no attempt to hide his wry amusement "I trust you have been enjoying our, ahem, offerings"

Daenerys exchanged a weary, yet venomous look with Jorah who quelled her thoughts with an incline of his head.

"Yes" She said through gritted teeth "Now what is it you want of me? You wish to feed me some more is that it?"

"My my, such fire in your belly... You truly are the Queen of Dragons" Said the Spice King "As it happens no that was not my intention... Though now you've mentioned it I suppose it couldn't hurt..."

Daenerys cursed her own quick tongue and groaned as, following a nod from the Spice King, several of the entourage approached and a steady stream of food was once again forced past her lips.

"As I was saying" The Spice King continued, his tone businesslike as Daenerys was fed before him "I... Or we I should say, would be honoured if you would grace us with your presence at a gathering this eve... It would be in your honour, a fitting welcome to Qarth"

"Mmmfff" Replied Daenerys, a slice of cake protruding from her mouth which was promptly pushed in "Urrrp"

"That sounds like a resounding yes to me" Said the Spice King with a smirk "We look forward to seeing you... As you were Khaleesi"

Sensing the end of the meeting, Daenerys feeders hurriedly stuffed as much food as physically possible into the poor blondes mouth. Handful after handful of luxurious, fattening cakes were forced into Daenerys already full belly until the Spice King cleared his throat to get their attention. Rather reluctantly the band of feeders slowly stopped stuffing the poor blonde beauty, though they couldn't help cramming in a last few handfuls first. They then bowed their heads to Daenerys who merely offered a feeble burp, and they scurried away in the Spice Kings wake. Once they were out of sight Daenerys slumped against a wall, slowly sliding down to the floor with a groan.

"Are you okay?" Asked Jorah.

"Hicccurrrppp!" Exclaimed Daenerys wearily "I don't know if I can take this much longer..."

"You have to Khaleesi... Be strong for your people, they need you" Replied Jorah.

Daenerys rolled her eyes as she stifled a cute hiccough, knowing that Jorah was right.

---------------------

A few hours later (feeding free hours thankfully) Daenerys and Jorah arrived at the gathering near the luxurious town square of the city. Daenerys had changed from her simple white dress into a very exotic, Quartheen dress provided to her by slave girls who also helped her dress in it. The dress was made of the finest red silk, with a low neckline to enhance the bosom and a leather ribbon tied corset around the middle. The dress also only reached her knees and was very figure hugging, a fact that Daenerys knew was to deliberately expose any weight gain.

"Greetings Mother of Dragons" Said Xaro warmly "I am so happy you could attend"

"I didn't really have a choice did I" Muttered Daenerys grumpily.

Xaro merely smiled before bowing his head and returned to his own circle of friends.

"Easy Khaleesi" Said Jorah in a low voice "Do not give them any reason to make things worse for you... We have very little bargaining power at present..."

Daenerys pouted, knowing Jorah was right but fumed inwardly that there was nothing she could do to change it. Daenerys spent the next ten minutes exchanging pleasantries with the upper echelon of Quarth high society. Everybody seemed pleasant and welcoming enough, though she still noticed a few exchanging quiet comments under their breath, giving her looks up and down to clearly determine if any weight had been gained by her.

What happens next?
155332222222222222222222222221111111.title: A taste of Qarth high society

choices: Daenerys is rescued from her fate by Pyat Pree
The ceremony ends with Daenerys outweighing the other woman
1553322222222222222222222222211111112.content:
"Greetings, Mother of Dragons" Came a rather eerie sounding voice from behind her "In so glad to be able to meet you"

Daenerys turned and saw a rather gaunt, almost snake like bald man standing before her. He was smiling, though his smile was not welcoming nor reassuring and Daenerys exchanged a cautious look with Jorah.

"You are one of The Thirteen" Said Daenerys slowly "I recognise you from our arrival here"

"Oh yes, you may call me Pyat Pree" Said the man "I am the city's chief warlock and would like to welcome you on behalf of all the warlocks of Qarth... i would like to extend to you an invitation to join me at the House of the Undying"

Daenerys could make see Xaro Xhoan Daxos in the crowd looking over to her, a look of concern on his face.

"Thank you for the very kind offer" Replied Daenerys carefully "But perhaps I should get settled here before hand"

"Of course Khaleesi" Said Pyat Pree, giving a deep bow with the unsettling smile still on his face "Some other time"

Pyat Pree wondered into the crowd just as Xaro approached.

"I am sorry about that Khaleesi" He said "Warlocks still have a presence in our society today... They are a strange folk"

"Yes, well... They aren't the only ones" Said Daenerys darkly, as she noticed the Spice King approach with his entourage.

"Greetings Khaleesi" He said "I am so glad you accepted our invitation... And you wore the outfit we had picked out for you"

"Yes, though you say it as though I had a choice" Daenerys bit back "I can see why you chose such a tight and revealing garment"

"Yes indeed" Replied the Spice King "In fact that reminds me..."

The Spice King approached a large ornate bell which had been suspended in the middle of the garden, and Daenerys shared a slightly worried look with Jorah and Xaro. The Spice King rang the bell and the crowds of Qarths high society fell silent. Daenerys awkwardly adjusted her tight fitting dress, as it pinched slightly at her armpits and breasts.

"Noble men and women of Qarth, our guest of honour has arrived in ceremonial dress" He announced loudly "And I'm sure you all know what that means..."

The crowd responded with a rather disconcerting roar of excitement, and Daenerys gulped nervously. Jorah had to consciously stop himself from drawing his sword as the large crowd of Qarth dignitaries suddenly swarmed Daenerys, taking her arms and pulling her away excitedly. Daenerys could only splutter indignantly as she was lead to a large golden pair of golden scales, which she had initially assumed was no more than an expensive sculpture. She could now see it was much more than that, as she saw a throne like chair on each scale. One was empty, but the other had another beautiful and elegantly dressed woman sat upon it. Daenerys raised an eyebrow, wondering what on insane spectacle they had prepared for her. The people of Qarth pushed her up a ladder to the top scale, where she sat on the throne. Daenerys looked down at the pretty young thing below her and saw that her "ceremonial" dress was even more tight fitting than hers was.

"Now" Announced the Spice King to the rabble "The pretty little thing on the left has been specially prepared for tonight... So as soon as our 'honoured' guest can get her scale to the ground, the initiation will be over!"

Daenerys stared in horror at this announcement, reading between the lines of The Spice Kings speech. The group formed under ladders which had been set to reach the top of the scale, and upon the Spice King ringing the bell once more they began hurriedly ascending towards Daenerys. Before she could give an angry response a steady stream of familiar exotic, fattening foods found its way pushed past her lips. She could see Jorah trying not to meet her eye, which he probably thought was to save her dignity but it only embarrassed her further. It wasn't long until poor Daenerys could feel the fabric of her short dress begin to feel rather restrictive and uncomfortable over her belly.

What happens next?
1553322222222222222222222222211111112.title: A strange introduction

15533222222222222222222222222111111122.content:
As the great feeding ceremony went on music was played, with men beating large drums and others playing many other exotic instruments. Jorah turned to the Spice King who was watching on rather smugly, a look that Jorah would really have like to permanently remove from his face.

"I know what your trying to do" Said Jorah simply.

"Oh?" Replied The Spice King, not even looking at Jorah.

"This is no more a Qarth tradition than is juggling manticores" Said Jorah "Your trying to break her... But let me just advise you one thing, you will never break her. She will soon sit on the iron throne as she was destined to, and on that day you will regret this little show very dearly"

"Well then... Until that day" Said The Spice King with an incline of the head, clearly amused.

The two men watched on in silence as the music played and Daenerys was stuffed silly on the giant scales.

.......

The people of Qarth had had a merry evening indeed, drinking and dancing the night away while taking their turns to feed the Princess. Daenerys evening had been a lot less enjoyable, as despite the fact she had felt full pretty early on the feeding had not relented whatsoever. Slowly the large ornate scale she was sat upon began to descend, indicating the extra weight that was being forcibly added to her frame beginning to match that of the slave girl on the other side.

"That's it!" Called out the Spice King "Feed her quicker! She's almost reached the ground"

Daenerys was just able to give a forlorn look before she was fed even faster than before, with the citizens of Qarth using both hands to stuff as much food into her mouth as quickly as possible.

"We'll see who cannot be broken" Said the Spice King quietly to his entourage, smiling as he locked eyes with Daenerys.

"Uhh... Urrrrp" She exclaimed weakly.

Daenerys eyes were drooping severally from fatigue at this point, but even so the Spice King could still see a fire there that he had thus far failed to extinguish. Though this displeased him, he was rather pleased to see how tightly fitting the Princesses outfit was becoming, particularly over her bloated belly, as it looked as though the slightest wrong move would pop a seam or two. Finally the scale Daenerys was sat upon reached the floor, though her feeders seemed reluctant to stop and merely carried on piling fattening foods into her mouth.

"She has reached the ground" Growled Jorah "Your spectacle is over, command your people to stop"

The Spice King looked outraged at Jorahs tone, but reeled himself in when he saw the look on his face and the Dothraki warriors at his side.

"Very well" Said The Spice King, turning deliberately slowly and clearing his throat before speaking "Citizens of Qarth... Lend me your ears... I would like to congratulate you all on your commendable job with our honoured guest..."

Jorah scowled at The Spice King as he spoke deliberately slowly, with a long pause between each sentence. Meanwhile Daenerys feeding continued unabated, as she slumped back in her chair moaning miserably offering the odd feeble hiccup or burp between each mouth full. She could feel the seams begin to slowly pop under her armpits, as her food stuffed belly pushed harder and harder against the restrictive corset of her sexy dress.

"... And what's that I hear?" Continued The Spice King slowly "The popping of seams? What a great compliment from the Mother of Dragons for your efforts! You have stuffed her so full of food that her Quartheen garments can no longer contain her!"

With that poor Daenerys let out a rather large burp after swallowing a particularly large mouthful of sweet pastries, and a few of the ribbon ties on her corset popped open allowing her insanely bloated belly room to expand outward. Despite the fact Daenerys clothes were literally bursting at the seams trying to contain her the feeding team didn't miss a beat and the veritable avalanche of food continually poured past her weary lips.

"End this now" Growled Jorah, his tone even more deadly than before "Or I will end you"

The Spice King scoffed at the threat, turning his gaze from the neverending feeding to face Jorah.

"If you draw your sword you, along with all your followers will be killed" Said The Spice King.

"Maybe so" Replied Jorah almost casually "But that won't be any concern of yours... Just imagine what I will be able to do to you before then... I guarantee you, you will not enjoy it"

Jorahs gaze was intense, the murder in his eyes plain to see and The Spice King shrank from it.

"My people" He hastily called out "I hereby announce the end of the ceremony. I think our special guest has, ahem, eaten her fair share!"

The crowd laughed amongst themselves at this understatement, as the Princess had consumed so much she looked as though she were in the final trimester of pregnancy. The feeding now slowed, before stopping altogether, though even then a few citizens couldn't resist piling in a last few handfuls of food. When they were done a few of the men moved the ladder over to the slave girl, who had been patiently waiting the whole time. While she was helped down The Spice King smiled, as despite Jorahs threats he was determined to remain in charge.

"And a special thank you to our, heh, human weight" He said "Tell us all my dear, how much do you weigh?"

"140 pounds or so" She answered, seemingly not at all embarrassed.

"Ahh, so there we have it" Said The Spice King, turning a maddening smile on Jorah and the rest of Daenerys Dothraki entourage "The Princess now has a new weight, that being somewhere north of 140 pounds"

To be exact Daenerys now weighed 145 pounds which, considering that the petite princess had only weighed around 125 on her arrival, was a rather impressive gain to say the least. As the feeding team disbanded Daenerys merely sat slumped in her chair breathing heavily, seemingly barely conscious at all.

"You may use this if you want to get her back to her quarters" Said The Spice King to Jorah with wry amusement "Have a pleasant evening"

The Spice Kings entourage placed something that resembled a stretcher before Jorah, though in typical Quartheen style it was a very lavish and elegant example of one. Jorah scowled as The Spice King left, and the rest of the Quartheen high society followed in his wake.

What happens next?
15533222222222222222222222222111111122.title: The great feeding ceremony

choices: Daenerys must perform a series of humiliating tasks to get the ships
The Thirteen allow her to have the ships and leave Qarth
155332222222222222222222222221111111221.content:
Daenerys slept soundly that night, despite the seemingly inescapable predicament she found herself in. This was of course attributed to the sheet amount that she had consumed that evening, as she had dozed when Jorah and one of her Dothraki guard had stretchered her back to her personal quarters. Daenerys was allowed her own personal guard on the entrance to her quarters, but though they were an effective deterrent to any would be assassin, they were not able to stop visiters sent by any of The Thirteen. That morning she awoke to the noise of the door to her quarters being opened, and she sat up wiping the sleep from her eyes as she got her bearings.

"Good morning Khaleesi" Said the head of a group of female servants who had just entered "I hope you have slept well"

"As well as can be expected" Said Daenerys testilly, rolling her eyes when she noticed a large food laden cart which was being pulled behind the group.

"The Thirteen have had us prepare breakfast for you" Explained the woman, noticing Daenerys gaze.

"How very kind" Said Daenerys hollowly "If you leave it here I will get round to eating it shortly"

She almost laughed at her own promise, knowing full well it would not be so simple to get out of another feeding.

"Unfortunately Khaleesi..." Said The woman awkwardly, confirming what Daenerys already knew "The Thirteen council were quite... Specific. They wish us to feed you this..."

Daenerys sighed, feeling how her midsection felt a little tight in her silk sleeping attire, as it bunched uncomfortably around her stomach when she sat up.

"Very well" Said Daenerys "Just get it over with..."

The other servant girls didn't seem to speak english but following a nod from the head servant they eagerly pulled the food laden cart over to Daenerys bed side. In a manner that she was becoming accustomed to, Daenerys was now eagerly fed her breakfast.

.....

After half an hour of constant feeding, Daenerys groggily emerged from her chamber clutching her food stuffed belly.

"Greetings Khaleesi" Said Jorah, trying to avoid make Daenerys feel self conscious by not acknowledging the large breakfast feeding she'd just had "Our presence is requested at the main council Hall"

"Hiccurrrp" Exclaimed Daenerys suddenly, causing her to blush from embarrassment "Um, excuse me... Let's see what they want now"

Daenerys made her way to the grand Hall, where The Thirteen met to discuss the business of Qarth accompanied by her small band of nomadic body guards and Jorah. She was feeling rather ungraceful and heavy after her excessive breakfast feeding, and was hoping that the walk to the hall would be feeding free. It didn't take long however before she had walked past some Qarth citizens, who gleefully piled food into her mouth without warning. It seemed every person they passed had something to feed poor Daenerys, which could probably be attributed to the fact that all the citizens of Qarth now carried food on them at all times, just in case they crossed paths with the Princess. By the time she reached the hall Daenerys has crossed paths with more eager citizens than she could count, and upon reaching the grand oak doors of the building she was being supported by Jorah as she was too stuffed to walk unaided. The poor Princess was doubled over and groaning, holding her taut stomach that was obviously bulging against her usual white dress (which was usually quite loose fitting). The Thirteen were all sat around a large table waiting for Daenerys to join them. Upon entering the young beauty gave a respectable show of strength by standing straight, her head held high doing her upmost to show no weakness in front of The Thirteen.

"You wished to -hic- see me?" Said Daenerys, her tone defiant.

"Oh my Khaleesi" Said The Spice King with mock concern "Are you with child?"

Daenerys flushed red as there were a few chuckles in the room from the obvious jab at her food stuffed belly.

"No" She growled "You know very well why I look the way I do, so..."

"Oh of course how could I be so forgetful" He replied, still smiling his maddening smile "Well it appears you've gained a few extra pounds there since only last night..."

Daenerys gritted her teeth, not wanting to think about this fact (She was now at 153lbs, which wasn't bad for an hours work) as she rearranged her dress that was clinging to her tummy.

"Enough" Yelled Daenerys, getting angry despite trying to remain calm and dignified "Why am I here? Xaro?"

Daenerys turned to Xaro Xhoan Daxos, knowing she would get nothing but subtle insults from the Spice King.

"We have been discussing your request for ships" He said "To transport you to Westeros. A decision has been reached, if you would like to hear it?"

What is decided?
155332222222222222222222222221111111221.title: A meeting with The Thirteen

choices: Daenerys finds the key and is allowed to leave
All is not as it seems...
1553322222222222222222222222211111112211.content:
"... Yes" Said Daenerys, resembling a pouting child for a moment.

"Well, after much deliberation we have decided to grant you your request" Said Xaro, his voice sounding grave as he continued "However, a few of the Thirteen have decided that you must first earn them"

"As always Xaro remains at his position on the fence during important political decisions" Said The Spice King, and Xaro narrowed his eyes darkly at the obvious jab "But those of us with sound mind were able to reach a decision. As I'm sure you can appreciate ships are very valuable here, this being one of the oldest and most thriving port cities of this world. So, as you have nothing of any value to us to trade, we have devised another solution. If you wish to have your ships you will need to earn them through a series of trials, each more testing than the last"

"And how many of these trials will involve me being forced fatter and fatter?" Asked Daenerys derisively, raising an eyebrow.

"Oh well" Said The Spice King carelessly "Put it this way my 'Queen'... I would be surprised if any ship in our fleet would be capable of carrying you one you've finished... In fact..."

The Spice King clicked his fingers and Daenerys groaned before the flow of food was again relentlessly forced past her lips.

"So, as I was saying" Continued The Spice King as the beautiful princess was force fed "Your first trial will begin at dusk today... If you want your ships you will be her at that time. Good day Khaleesi"

The Thirteen dispersed and Jorah glared after them while the servants continued to pile food into poor Daenerys mouth.

"Follow your damn masters" Growled Jorah, causing the servants to jump.

They fed Daenerys even faster now, determined to get as much food into her belly as possible before Jorah forced them to leave. Jorah took a menacing step forward and the servants fled, following their masters from the great Hall. Daenerys let out a weary burp before slumping into a chair, her eyes half closed as she groaned.

"It may not seem it Khaleesi" Said Jorah as gentle a tone he could muster "But your people appreciate and respect all that your going through for them..."

"Hiccurrrp" Exclaimed Daenerys "Kind words Ser Jorah... But I don't know how much longer I can take this... I fear I may not be able to complete these trials the Spice King mentioned"

"You've come this far Khaleesi" Urged Jorah "I fear this is the only option we have"

Daenerys rolled her eyes, knowing grimly that he spoke the truth but wondering if she was indeed going to be capable of sitting a ship without sinking it after the trials.

"I know" She said quietly "Damn it, I know"

.........

For the rest of the day Daenerys went into hiding, trying to avoid being force fed for at least a couple of hours before she'd have to face her first trial. On her way back to her quarters however she was accosted several times by citizens who were eager to give her a good stuffing. Jorah had no choice but to allow them to feed her but his menacing demeanor at least meant they didn't stick around for too long. The now 158lb Khaleesi lay on her bed in her private quarters, breathing heavily and feeling like a beached whale after the days feedings. Her full belly was clearly visible under her dress, as the material was clinging to it with a few stress lines stretching across the fabric.

.....

She must have dozed off, as when she opened her eyes next the sun was setting in Qarth. A bell was sounding someway in the distance and once she'd gathered her bearings Daenerys knew it was time to face her first trial.

"Its time Khaleesi" Said Jorah softly, confirming her fears.

Daenerys nodded and rose to a sitting position, noticing how her dress bunched tightly around her middle as she did. She walked to the Great Hall with her small entourage, noticing how no citizens attempted to feed her on the way. At the hall she saw large groups of people, with the Thirteen standing in front expectantly.

"Welcome" Said The Spice King, unsurprisingly choosing to be the master of ceremony for the event "It is time for your first trial... Please approach, alone"

Jorah nodded reassuringly to Daenerys who reluctantly stepped forward.

"Extend your arms into the air" Barked the Spice King and Daenerys obeyed.

A few guards now stepped forward, holding what appeared to be steel stocks. This was fastened around her neck and had a long steel bar which spread along her arms and was manacled to her wrists, forcing her arms wide apart and keeping them locked there.

"Your first trial is simple" Said The Spice King, enjoying the look of fear in the Princess's face "To demonstrate to us all what you are prepared to do for the good of your people..."

The Spice King nodded at the guards who now pulled a large sheet from a table which had been set up in front of them, underneath which were three gigantic cakes.

"The key for your restraints is in one of those cakes" He said simply "I'm sure you can guess on the method you will need to use to find it..."

Daenerys glared at the Spice King, trying to move her arms but only managing to stagger awkwardly from side to side due to her restraints.

"You may begin when your ready" Said The Spice King with a smirk at the look of malice in the beautiful Princess's eyes.

After a few moments, where Daenerys attempted to angle her outstretched hands to grab the cake and failed, she sighed and lowered her face to the first cake. The cakes were almost the same height as she was and she dreaded to think the amount of calories each one contained. Her first bite was careful, as she wanted to maintain whatever little dignity she had left in front of the whispering crowds.

"Its going to take you an awful long time to find the key like that" Said The Spice King "And the people here came to see a show..."

He inclined his head at the guards, who proceeded to roughly push Daenerys face down into the cake. Jorah drew his sword, but the guards responded in kind.

"Nerrff Juwur" Said Daenerys, barely audible with her face stuffed in the cake, though she also halted him with her outstretched palm "I cerrn do this..."

With considerable effort Jorah checked his anger and sheathed his sword. All eyes fell from him landed on the princess who began gorging on the cake like a pig.

What happens next?
1553322222222222222222222222211111112211.title: The first trial of Daenerys

choices: The next day another trial is announced
Daenerys is allowed a day off
1553322222222222222222222222211111112211.content:
Daenerys soon lost all decorum, as it would just slow her down whereas she wanted to get it over and done with as quickly as possible. Her face had completely disappeared into the crator she'd eaten into the side of the rich chocolate cake, and all that could be heard was muffled grunts and munching from her. The crowds cheered while Jorah and the few Dothraki who had walked to the hall stood awkwardly, not wanting to watch the humiliating spectacle. Daenerys jerked ungracefully from side to side as she tried to angle her face to eat her way through the cake, but the iron stocks made any such dexterity difficult.

"Come on Mother of Dragons, where's your appetite?" Asked The Spice King so all the crowd could hear "Surely you have room in that growing belly of yours to eat faster? It would be nice if we could get this finished before the morning sun"

Joffrey sat at the head of the table, with his mother at his left hand, and his bride-to-be at his right. He was dressed in a gold tunic, inlaid with the the sigil of House Baratheon, the crowned stag, and a black cape draped over his shoulder. Both women wore the colours of their respective houses, Cersei in a red satin dress, with long dagged sleeves, while Margaery wore a low-cut sleeveless bodice over a long green skirt, decorated with the golden flowers of Highgarden.

"It is very kind of the queen to join us, isn't it my lord?" Margaery said with a smile, placing her hand on his. "When her role as regent means that she is always so busy."

Cersei smiled back. "Sometimes it is necessary to act, but the most important duty of a queen is to serve and please the king, wouldn't you agree?"

"Of course." Margaery nodded, as though Cersei had unveiled a great wisdom. She laced her hand with Joffrey's and looked into his eyes. "My only wish is to please my lord Joffrey."

He smiled, but it was a thin one, not reaching his eyes. He looked away and pounded his free hand on the table. "Bring out the food!"

Immediately the doors swung open and a number of servants trooped in, carrying with them plates and platters of food. Freshly baked bread, ripe fruits and cold meats were placed on the table, along with an assortment of fine cheeses and sweet pastries, while servers refreshed glasses of wine and water.

Joffrey was served first of course, followed by Cersei and Margaery. Margaery selected a modest portion, a piece of bread lightly buttered, a thin slice of cured ham, and a small bunch of grapes. Cersei looked meaningfully at Joffrey, her eyes darting back to Margaery's plate.

"My lady, does this food displease you?" He asked after a moment's hesitation, his words polite but his voice laced with steel.

"My lord?" Margaery said, and Cersei smiled to see her caught off balance.

"I only ask because you pick at your food like a beggar woman picking through the scraps of a feast." Joffrey went on, colour rising in his cheeks. "Perhaps my table compares poorly to that of my traitorous uncle Renly."

Margaery bowed her head. "Forgive me my lord, if I have offended you. Please believe that it was not my intent."

She raised her head again, and Cersei was impressed to see tears welling in the corners of her eyes.

"But I ask you my lord, how can simple food compare to the majesty of your presence?" She said, her voice quavering. "I feel as though your love is all I need to sustain me."

To Cersei's annoyance, this flattery had the desired effect, and the fire faded from Joffrey's eyes. He touched his hand to Margaery's cheek, wiping away a tear.

"Cry not, sweet lady." He said soothingly. "Your offense is already forgotten. Now, let us eat."

While Cersei and Joffrey spoke vaguely about the affairs of the Seven Kingdoms, Margaery quietly added more food to her plate, taking another slice of bread, more meats and even some cheese, the sharp crumbly yellow that came from across the Narrow Sea. This achieved, she began to eat, slowly but methodically, spearing chunks of meat with her knife and dabbing grease from her lips with a handkerchief, occasionally nibbling on a slice of bread. The cheese and grapes followed, the sweet fruit serving a pleasant counterpoint to the tang of the cheese. She laid down her knife just as Cersei was finishing a point about the Iron Islands.

"... are not a real threat. Your uncle Jaime has often said that..." She paused, noticing Margaery's empty plate. "Ah, it seems a body cannot live on love alone after all."

She smiled and signaled to the servants, who began to refill her plate. Margaery began to politely protest, until she noticed the approving look on Joffrey's face. More meat, bread and cheese was piled on to her plate, along with another bunch of grapes and two juicy plums. Joffrey freshened her wine glass himself, an honour she made sure to thank him for profusely. This done he resumed conversing with his mother, leaving Margaery little option but to continue eating.

She was full after the first few bites, uncomfortably so a few bites later, her bloated stomach pressing against the inside of her tight dress. The flow of conversation slowed to a trickle, as mother and son both watched her eat, sipping their wine as she struggled on resolutely.

She chewed and swallowed without really tasting the food, whether it was meat or cheese or fruit, washing it all down with the sweet red wine. Eventually she managed to clean her plate, leaving only a crust of bread and pits from the plums. She felt fuller then she ever had before, her swollen stomach painfully compressed by her rigid leather bodice. She was working hard to suppress any belches that were threatening to break loose.

Cersei looked at her, feeling pleased that her plan had worked so well. She glanced at Joffrey, who also seemed to be enjoying himself, a faint sheen of sweat visible on his forehead.

"You know, Margaery." She said, as though the thought had just occurred to her, "You really must taste these pastries, they are simply delicious."

Cersei's own pastry sat uneaten on her plate, but that didn't matter. Margaery looked to Joffrey, who was watching her closely. He nodded.

Margaery felt as though she might burst if she even looked at a pastry, but the look on Joffrey's face gave her hope. It was a look she was very familiar with, though she had never seen it on Renly's face and only sporadically on Joffrey's. It was the look of desire.

"Just a moment, my lord." She said, as she began to unlace her bodice, from the bottom upward. Cersei looked puzzled but Joffrey was the one who mattered, and he appeared entranced as more and more of Margaery's bloated belly was exposed. There was quickly enough room for her to breathe easily again, and she allowed herself a long, audible sigh of relief. With the extra room afforded by this manoeuvre, she easily ate not one but two of the pastries.

Cersei attempted a quip about the latest Highgarden fashions but Joffrey was deaf to it, still staring longingly at Margaery. Moments later, after the most basic pleasantries, the royal couple had departed, Joffrey supporting Margaery with an arm around her waist. As soon as the door closed behind them, Cersei's smile turned to a scowl. Somehow Margaery had come out on top, shooting Cersei a victorious glance over her shoulder as they walked away.

She sipped her wine and picked at the uneaten pastry still sitting on her plate. She had tried the subtle approach, appealing to Joffrey's insecurities. Maybe Pycelle had something more obvious that would wipe that smile off of her face...

And as the days had passed, the effects had made themselves known. Margaery had grown plumper by the day it seemed to Cersei, as though every morsel that passed her lips found a home on her hips. Some stated with confidence that Joffrey had planted a baby in Margaery's belly, and that the wedding was being pushed forward, while others claimed that it wasn't Joffrey who had done the planting, but rather Robb Stark, or any member of the Kingsguard, or even the ghost of Renly Baratheon.

At first she had been delighted to find Joffrey so enamoured of her expanding figure, and so eager to see it expand further. It made him much more amenable to her suggestions, so much easier to control. He was suddenly so eager to fulfil her every request, large or small.

That 'couple handfuls' of chips goes quite nicely with the beer you had last night, the shots, then the three or four chili dogs you somehow managed to eat today..." the brunette ticked off, grinning wider now as Kenzi wiped her mouth off with a sleeve, looking incredulous at her and putting her hands on her hips.

"For your information, it was FIVE! And fries. Okay, maybe I did eat a lot more than I'm supposed to, but come on! They were having a sale!" Kenzi pouted before turning around. Finishing up the bag of chips, she gulped down the last handful and started ruffling through the bag by her feet, looking for her new pants. Bo could swear she could hear seams popping as she bent over, and Kenzi DID look a little fleshier. In fact, she looked a good deal fleshier. Maybe not fifty pounds but at least twenty or thirty. Bo could almost reach out and pinch a rather substantial sliver of blubber that was poking out over the waistband of those stressed pants, seams popping as Kenzi seemed to grow with every moment, every mouthful of food contributing to bubbles of adipose appearing on her frame. The succubus caught herself as she realized her hand had snaked out, inches from that little bit of fat, Kenzi's butt filling her pants a little TOO nicely. She had been eating quite a bit more these last few weeks, and it had coincided with her starting to go shopping more frequently. It didn't help that with each new run, Bo started noticing Kenzi physically growing if she ate too much. Not just a stuffed gut either, but actual fat filling her frame out. Backing off, she watched with interest as her gothic friend tugged off her pants, sighing happily as that constrictor was let loose. "Aaaaah...much better."

"If I didn't know you any better, I'd say you were getting thick, Kenz." The snark in that remark caused her to perk up. Standing up straight and turning her head to face her best friend, the Russian girl huffed, her full, pale backside to Bo. Her eyes dropped to Kenzie's pert, larger cheeks, pale moons as big as melons and clad in a pair of violet panties that tugged at her skin and sank into the plush flesh. Her eyes roamed about her fattened hips and even her calves, noting that they all looked a little fuller. Even the curve of a pudgy stomach couldn't escape her eye. Despite knowing Kenzi was straight, and knowing that this kind of weight gain was a bit worrisome, some nagging voice in the back of her mind said, I think she could be a little bigger...

Kenzi huffed as she shook the embarrassment of having Bo's eyes gaze up and down, the knowledge that her friend was a succubus little comfort in those roaming eyes. Putting one slender foot through a pant leg and dropping the other one in with ease, it looked like it was going to be an easy fit. But disaster struck as the goth pulled them up her creamy thighs, the tight pants cinching themselves around her swollen legs. Gaping in shock, Kenzi tried to haul them up, jumping up and down to try and force them over, grunting and twirling about with the effort. "HRRRRRNGH! Come on! I just bought these today and they FIT at the mall! Unless....ugh! I'm gonna kill that clerk! she switched the pant sizes, I swear!"

Bo could only watch the display mutely, occasionally raising a finger to ask or answer a question, but quickly withdrawing any input. The brunette couldn't help but think that with each bounce, that nagging little voice in her head kept chanting, Bigger...bigger...bigger! Her mind clouded and she quickly tried to think resolutely of something else.

Meanwhile, in a dark corner of the house that had enough view of the antics going on, a decrepit hand slid out of a mirror, silent as the grave. A soft, sinister cackle floated in the air as a finger pointed at Kenzi, glowing subtly with an air of dark power. A mysterious symbol appeared in front of it before dissipating into nothingness, the soft cackle dying out as the hand slid back into the mirror. Kenzi let out a yelp as she heard the pant seams split slightly, Bo watching as lightly as she could while her face grew red from the disastrous fitting. "DAMN IT! I swear, Bo, don't you dare laugh!"

"What, at your imitation of a Native American rain dance?"

1553322222222222222222222222222112112.content:
A pair of bulky asscheeks contained in a barely-fitting set of black lingerie danced in front of her, coupled to thunderous thighs that quaked and quivered with every sensual step. The short heeled boots she wore squeaked and groaned at the weight of their owner, the seams popping softly as she moved her hips in a sultry fashion, pillars of soft flesh clad in a pair of dark, fine fishnets. A rolling, pale gut descended down over her crotch, the girth rumbling softly, almost asking to be fed as it sagged over her dimpled knees, the topmost roll clad in a black corset that stretched up to heft her rather large, but modest bust up. Bo was entranced, the succubus in her delighting in the display as she sat bound to a chair, hands and legs bound and the brunette unable to move. Kenzi's plump face gazed down, full enough get rid of that curve, while slightly thicker fingers tugged at the garters and straps that held up her fishnets. She bit her lip as her raven-haired friend moved closer, sashaying her mammoth width left and right and causing the floor to creak under her girth. Was it just her, or was the fat...growing?

Slow and sensual, Kenzi reached Bo before sliding into place, moving her gigantic legs around the brunette and depositing her huge rear in her lap. The Russian girl's brilliant eyes flashed back before a smile curled on her lips, her body rumbling. Come on, say it. That little word on your lips. What, cat got your tongue? Or is the Goodyear Blimp that awe-inspiring?

The boots creaked, and Bo swore she could hear seams snap. The weight was huge, soft, almost like marshmallow or warm dough that washed over her. Kenzi was bulking up bigger still, that poor, sexy outfit trying hard not to give up the ghost. But that word! That teasing word that rippled through her mind all night. Her lips were dry, and she licked them, her voice caught in her throat at the 600-pound behemoth that rested on her frame. Kenzi may have been diminutive, but the blubber rectified that, and then some. The monstrous thighs swelled, and she could feel them pressing against her torso. Heat rose to her cheeks, and she felt that same warmth enter between her thighs. Oh, it made her so weak! And Kenzi was leaning closer, waiting for the barest whisper. Bo had to give it. She wanted it, all of it, just for herself. Her voice came out as dry as dust, but filled with lust and desire, Bigger.

A surge of growth erupted and Bo gasped as the air was squeezed from her lungs, face growing red and her mind clouded.over again. That unbelievably cuddly flesh filled her vision, and the weight had grown even heavier, softer, and warmer on her figure. She heard the boots and garters snap softly, the bulging figure of her friend far too large to contain. Kenzi smirked. Say it again. You know I'm nowhere near where you want.

Bo knew it. Her heart ached. Her mind seethed at her, begging to her to release that one simple phrase. Those lips parted, the tongue complying as her will bent. BIGGER.

- - - - - - - - - - - - -

The succubus gasped as the dream dissipated, eyes going wide in shock as it cleared from the fog of sleep. That heavy, obese figure of Kenzi's could still be felt on her lap, and she took deep, relieving breaths, trying to escape from what she just experienced. No way...Kenzi was straight as an arrow, and no matter WHAT Bo thought of her, cute and sexy and all, she was not going to violate that. That was especially true now, considering that she seemed to be ballooning and eating for four or five! She was lucky; her goth friend had passed out after a thrashing escapade with the clothes, each new outfit or garment seemingly too small for her once svelte frame. Eventually, she had gorged herself silly on some fudge brownie ice cream with Bo and passed out, and was sleeping soundly in the next room. Thank god.

Bo's face went red as her thoughts traveled back to the dream, and saw the sun-eclipsing cheeks lower themselves, quivering softly, engorged with soft adipose and craving more. She couldn't bear it; Kenzi looked quite a bit better with a few more pounds in the right places, but that...for some reason, the sight of the Russian girl made huge liquefied her insides and made her crave something almost primal. It was worse than it was when she was with Dyson! Even Lauren couldn't hold a candle to this sort of hunger.

But she needs to be bigger...so much bigger. Maybe after this little growth episode is over, she might swing another way~? The voice in her head rationalized. Bo shook her head again, rubbing at her temples and trying to shoo the voice away. It was still there and, despite barely holding any water, she was starting to cling to that little bit of hope. But, of course, something had to be done. This current state was reversible. She needed to make it not so for a great length of time. Couple months, maybe. No, more. She needed her to be the perfect size. No way six or seven hundred pounds was perfect. She needed more.

What was she thinking?! She hardly knew. Yet, her body knew what to do as her legs slid off the bed, the succubus drifting through the house down to the kitchen again. Kenzi was dead asleep, so she wouldn't hear a thing. Nor would she feel anything, if what her body was up to made any sense. First, her arm reached up and opened the freezer, grabbing the bucket of ice cream that Kenzi hadn't been able to finish. Next came something she thought was a bit odd: a small bottle labeled 'essence of A. Muscaria.' This, along with a spoon, she grabbed in order to take it up to Kenzi's room and perform a little bit of 'night feeding' for her growing friend. A pinch of this, the little voice nagged, and normally she'd be tripping. But a specially prepared liquefied form from a Fae apothecary? It had an enlarging effect in this state that would make Kenzi's current weight gain look like a celebrity crying over one or two pounds. Maybe not so extreme right off the bat, but given how it would increase the Russian girl's appetite as well as enhance the qualities of the food she ate? Well, Kenzi would be crying about how she couldn't find a decent pair of boots in stores yet.

Sliding into Kenzi's room, the brunette found her bloated friend laying belly-up, another ten or so pounds giving the Russian girl a fuller gut. Currently, she was sleeping in a top that let her belly free, her panties swallowed underneath the bulging mound. Bo was about to lose it. Despite knowing Kenzi's preferences, something was pulling her forward, telling her to stroke that full surface and then suckle on toes that were obviously just a little plumper. Her face was beet red and she was panting heavily, hands shaking. She needed to finish this quickly. Putting the bucket of ice cream down, she unscrewed the cap of the essence bottle deftly before pouring it into the raven-haired girl's mouth, the bottle's contents sliding down without a trace. Sighing with relief, she watched as Kenzi seemed to pork up just a bit more, stomach rumbling softly as it demanded a midnight meal. The succubus was more than willing to comply.

Opening up the bucket of ice cream, she took out a large scoop and dipped it into Kenzi's mouth, worried that the cold might wake her up. The secondary effects of the essence, however, prevented such a thing from happening. The raven-haired troublemaker was sound asleep, blissful rest the only thing on her mind. Her body, however, was more than accepting of Bo's offering. When the spoon dipped into her mouth with a chunk of ice cream, her lips wrapped around it and quickly sucked off the frozen treat, her throat clenching and her throat humming as it was devoured. Bo watched in awe as her body seemed to grow ever so slightly, the sleepwear threads moaning softly at the increased bulk of its owner. The essence worked quickly, far more quickly than she thought.

She dipped the spoon back into the fudge brownie mix, repeating the movements with barely-held excitement. This was perfect; just enough to make Kenzi shrug it off, but more than enough to make sure that it didn't just melt away at the end. Again, Kenzi's body eagerly accepted the proffered scoop of ice and that soft wave of new flesh appeared on her frame. Bo wanted to squeeze the newly-fattening belly, but held back; she didn't want to wake her friend amidst this lovely evening.

And so, the spoon dove into the mix again, each spoonful lovingly ladled into Kenzi's awaiting mouth, to be gulped up in her sleep. By the morning, she might notice, but Bo had a backup plan indeed. One that involved a bit more shopping to keep this ruse up.

15533222222222222222222222222221121121.content:
The fattened Kenzi groaned as her phone alarm went off at the usual-ish noon, the electronic device vibrating and ringing loud enough to wake the dead in her groggy opinion. A fat arm flopped against the bedspread as she reached a chubby hand over towards the offending item, the tips of her fingers touching the barest edge of the phone before she let out a groan of frustrated from between her chubby cheeks. Touching it twice more, she seethed before rolling over onto her plush side with a heave of force, slamming her plump palm on top of the phone triumphantly before keying in her password and shutting the irritating racket off. Black hair splayed all over her face, she huffed a little, brilliant eyes peering out from underneath strands of her bangs. She smacked her lips once, quirking them and lapping at the cusp, the Russian girl rousing a bit more. "Man, that must've been some really strong fudge brownie ice cream...oh god."

She looked at her swollen chest, clad in a snug shirt that highlighted them on her once trim frame, and her eyes set sight upon tubby arms which led into thickened forearms and her plusher palms. Her right hand moved back as she craned her head to look down at her bulging middle, a fattened pot belly pouring out from her waist and tinted the color of fresh dough, the chunky digits meeting the curve of her adipose-packed rear and causing her to gasp deeply in the horror of her revelation. Bulky thighs rubbed together as she drew them in, Kenzi sitting up as she took full stock of her ballooned figure. She could even tell that her feet had plumped, and her underwear fit far too snugly into the crest of her bloated hips and the hidden plain of her crotch, belly pouring over it. A rough estimate would put her around 250ish pounds...just how much did she eat yesterday?! "Oh god I'm fat...maybe Bo's right...maybe I've been eating way too much...My svelte, adorable little frame! My cute button buns! My...well, I have to say the chest is an improvement, but still! My trim, flat tummy! I knew I had put on some weight, but come on!"

"Maybe...maybe I can get a return! Maybe I got a size too small this time...too small for marshmallow thighs anyway!" Kenzi blurted as she swung her plump calves over, wincing as she felt her thighs wobble and her plump gut settle into her bulging lap. Staring at the bag of clothes from yesterday, the raven-haired woman slid a pair of socks on for her bootwear, muttered something about having balloon toes now thanks to her recently gained weight before standing up and walking over, her thighs brushing against one another but not quite enough for a waddle yet. Still, the feeling caused her to whimper as she began to dig through the bag, feeling a breeze tickle the bulk of her ripe rump as it quivered, her black panties starting to sink into the cleft between the two pale moons. Dragging out the pair of pants that she tried on before, she stared at the garment and eyed it up and down, rubbing the luxurious denim fabric between her fingers and biting her lip. "Well...m-moment of truth..."

Starting to slide the garment on, she shivered as the fabric rubbed against her overly generous thighs, waiting for the point where the too-small pants legs would seize upon her pillowy legs and refuse to budge any further. As she pulled them up past the halfway mark, however, there was no resistance at all. Her worried face quickly turned to one of shock as she felt the pants slide over her bulging legs and wrap itself around her waist, a perfect fit with room to move and the fabric more than stretchy enough to allow her newly acquired bulk to breathe. Looking down in disbelief, she pushed them down and pulled them up again, hiking them as high as she could before buttoning them perfectly beneath the round swell of her thick middle. Licking her lips for a minute as she tried to comprehend how this could've happened, considering she struggled so hard yesterday to get them even a third of the way up her thunderous thighs, Kenzi reached in the bag and grabbed one of her new tops, shimmying into it with a fervor to ensure she hadn't gone totally bonkers. Like before, the dark fabric hugged her newfound curves well, but was comfortable, allowing her fat to breath despite the clothes being in her normal vein of style which tended to constrict the body if they happened to be slightly too thick..."WHAT?"

- - - - - - -

Having put on her magically-fitting outfit and even her beloved new boots with ease, Kenzi walked down the steps towards their open living room and dining area, a bit put off as she felt her thighs jiggle and quake with excess blubber. Her tummy was irritating too, a thick roll which just screamed 'fatty,' though she knew her lower half was a dead giveaway thanks to a quick peek in the mirror. Stepping onto the floor, she caught sight of Bo, who was busy thumbing away at the computer, a smile on her face as her raven-haired friend finally roused from sleep. The succubus folded her arms on the counter, leaning over with a smug grin, "Afternoon, sunshine! I thought you'd never wake up after that fudge brownie coma you put yourself into. Did the Russian bear hibernate peacefully?"

The goth stuck her tongue out as she came over, the smell of something delicious and familiar in the air dulling her senses for a moment as her stomach let out a low grumble of hunger. Sliding to the opposite side of the counter where Bo was, Kenzi folded her own arms, huffing. "If you must know, the chocolate coma was really good, but I didn't like waking up to the Stay Puft marshmallow gut that I got overnight. I mean, you must've seen me! I'm HUGE!"

"We've been under a lot of stress, Kenz. Maybe your drinking binges managed to catch up to you," Bo offered, trying hard not to laugh as Kenzi snorted but quickly turned back to glaring. Seeing her occasionally turn around, trying to find the source of the familiar scent, the brunette smirked again as she pulled out a plate of bacon, eggs and freshly made buttermilk pancakes soaked with syrup, everything on the platter screaming 'OH MY GOD, EAT ME!' to the thickened girl. The goth's jaw dropped and she stared at the meal, then back to Bo, pointing at it and back to herself with a thicker finger. Bo snickered, before nodding, pushing the plate towards her. "Think of it as an apology for all the jokes I'm going to hit you with today. And all the walking."

Kenzi immediately set on the bacon, stuffing a slice of the greasy fried pork into her mouth and moaning at the taste. Oh, it was brown sugar-soaked...! She was in heaven! Screw the fattiness, a dozen or so more pounds was more than worth the awesomeness of five strips of bacon. Rolling her eyes in bliss, she gulped down the mouthful, waving her hand, "Oh Bo, all the fat jokes are on me today because this is absolutely fantastic and did I tell you how much I love you? God, this bacon is bacon-TASTIC, it's so good-wait. Walking? Muffintop shortstuff doesn't like the sound of that."

A small printout was placed before Kenzi, detailing the loss of one valued pet...the likes of which was unheard of in the normal human realm. Looking at the page and the details, she looked up again at Bo as she snacked on another thick slice of pork, tugging at her pants slightly. "We're going looking for some lady's mystical fae pet which could probably eat us alive or give us some horrible disease?"

"Yep. It's our new job today. So as soon as you're finished, we're going to go investigating, and then we'll stop by the Dal on our way back," Bo answered, the grin growing wider as Kenzi made a displeased face as she scarfed down the meal. She could almost see the curve of her stomach as it fluffed up a bit more, the essence she gave her working wonders on her figure. She licked the corner of her lips, trying to make it seem she was just excited for the job, and being a bit mischievous at the raven-haired Russian's weighty misfortune.

"Okay, but you owe me dinner for the amount of physical labor this is gonna entail! I don't want to admit it, but being thicker has the downside of getting tired out a LOT faster. On the upside, I can drink even more!"

- - - - - - - - - - -

The day went fairly uneventfully...except for Kenzi's unequivocal snacking, which Bo was secretly more than happy to oblige for. At every corner stop across the city, the tubbified goth asked Bo for a snack to keep up her 'energy,' though it wasn't really a lie: being twice as heavy as she was before put a strain on her stamina, and she wasn't the greatest of trekkers before. Besides, the problem grew slightly worse as Kenzi plumped further, the essence working its way into her system and making her hunger rise with a bit more added weight on top for every morsel she consumed. Sitting at 270 pounds now, her clothes a bit more snug, Kenzi plopped onto a chair at the Dal Riata's bar, wincing a bit as the chair creaked. Trick, the bar's owner, raised an eyebrow at the thickened Kenzi before making his way over to her, wiping a glass out with a rag. He smiled at her, seeing her tired face and chuckling a little. "Bo wore you out?"

"Ugh, you have no idea...we spent all day chasing this crazy lady's pet...whatever it is. Like the computer couldn't even figure out what it was. She's coming, she's just finishing up a call with the client..." Kenzi muttered, head laying on the counter. Her stomach rumbled and she blushed, Trick looking a bit taken aback. "Sorry, Trickster. Been having cravings all day."

He waved it off, looking at her a bit worriedly. "Well, after you've been around the town, I would think so. Want something?"

"Yeah...mind getting me a couple huge bowls of those chili cheese fries you make? Or...maybe just make it a tossing bowl-sized order...and some beer? I need a cooler..." Kenzi replied, looking up at Trick with puppy dog eyes that he couldn't bear to disappoint. He smiled again and nodded before heading back, a bit worried...

"Kenzi's blowing up faster than a balloon on a helium tank. From what it looks like, those clothes fit this morning but they're already cinching up. Something's not right..." The diminutive bartender mused, loathe to indulge what is clearly a problem that might have a connection to the Fae but finding that he really didn't have a choice. If she had been eating all day while they were out, it wouldn't have mattered what kind of food she was eating; she would've just eaten even more. "I'll see if I can't get Bo to ask Lauren to examine her. She might've picked up something from their latest job."

Prepping Kenzi's absurdly large order with ease, it didn't take Trick too long to finish it, ladling on the well-known chili recipe for the Dal and adding a queso blend to the freshly fried spuds. He set the enormous bowl of chili cheese fries down on the counter, moving over to grab the Russian goth a tankard of good quality brew for her to guzzle down with the salty treat.

He shouldn't have left it unprotected.

A pipe rattled in the kitchen before letting out an ungainly hiss, a black miasma pouring from the minute break in the coupling before bleeding into the Dal. The telltale manifestation of Baba Yaga's power went unnoticed for the precious minutes Trick spent preparing Kenzi's drink, the old hag's spell detecting its target before diving towards the serving of fries. It soaked into food, working its malfested energy into the very substance of the meal, altering its properties so it was fit to fatten up Baba Yaga's greatest meal. Everything seemed to double or even triple in size, grease becoming evident as a film on the cheese and chili, the bowl once full now positively overflowing with even more of the fattening dish. The lightest wisp of smoke from the spell managed to cut itself off the process, knowing there was another part of the meal it could taint.

This wisp was barely noticeable by Trick, who stepped back into the kitchen with his brow furrowed. He thought he detected something unseemly with the warding on the Dal, but whatever it was had been too faint for him to really pinpoint its source. Seeing its opportunity, the wisp darted out towards the bar, finding the large tankard of beer the bar owner had set out for the intended victim and summarily dunking itself in with the barest hint of a splash. Unable to find the source of the disturbance, Trick grimaced before grabbing the even larger serving of chili fries, making a note that he should've cut down on Kenzi's portion anyway, even if she was still hungry afterwards. "Alright Kenz, here you go. An extra-large helping of chili fries and a beer on the side."

Her bright eyes lit up with glee at the sight of the dish, stomach rumbling as she caught a whiff of the tainted meal. Famished eyes tracked the beer as it was planted next to the supersized serving, Kenzi licking her lips and trying her best not to snatch the food out of Trick's hands. He was giving her a meal on her tab today; she could be a little more patient. "Thanks, Trick. God, I've been needing this all day. Come to mama-!"

She took a couple of cheese-and-chili-coated fries, bloated from the Russian Crone's magic and popped them into her mouth, the fries almost as thick as her chubby fingers. A soft moan escaped her lips as the tainted fries coated her tastebuds, the spell amplifying the flavor to almost ambrosial levels of goodness, hooking her slowly-transforming, gluttonous tongue on anything Baba Yaga corrupted. "Mmmph, so goooood...Trick outdid himself this time! I don't know what he put in these, but they're so delicious!"

With not another word, the gothic woman began to stuff her face like she had been doing all day, except this time it was frantic and almost needy stuffing, hands grabbing three or four fries at a time before shoveling them between her plump lips, hardly pausing in the meantime for a spot of enchanted beer to wash away the saltiness. Kenzi gorged obsessively on the spuds, groaning with obvious delight as the fattening meal filled up her belly even further. And fill it did. While the pear-shaped troublemaker plowed into her cursed food, the curse put upon it by Baba Yaga began to show its true colors. Her tummy rumbled, and with a satisfied groan as another handful passed into her maw, her stomach lurched outwards and her clothes creaked, Kenzi starting to grow fatter with every morsel she ate.

Another few chips, slathered in cheese and chili. A deep grumble grasped at her form, and it swelled outwards, already enormous thighs and hips beginning to inch over the side of the bar chair.

Soft moans of gluttonous satisfaction. A few threads snapping as her arms added a couple inches to their girth.

A swig of beer. Her additional chin and cheeks thickened.

Ravenous gulps and the delighted suckling of fingers. Her pants button popped, and her navel grew deeper as her gut rolled outwards.

More. Bigger.

More! Fatter!

More! Wider!

I can't get enough! Her belly smushed up against the bar counter and turgid upper arms split her shirt sleeves and hoodie, while great big rips erupted along the seam of per pants to let thick bubbles of pearly flesh spill through, steadily bulging out bigger and bigger as she devoured the cursed food. Her fingers grew thicker before her eyes, and yet she didn't stop, even as she felt her cheeks quiver a little more with every glorious bite she took. Her rapidly growing figure made a symphony of gurgles, creaks, and pops as her body rumbled with each wave of blubber added to her frame, boot buckles snapping as her calves grew too wide for the buckles to hold!

If there was an apt description for the formerly dimunitive Russian girl, it would've been "Balloon!" Her ass swelled against the seat of her pants and spilled over the back of the bar chair, while girthy hips and bloated lovehandles began to wash over the sides, pouring outwards as she blew up with lard. She leaned back and gave a slightly stifled belch, her belly blubber quaking as it rose towards the lip of the bar. Grasping the beer in a thick hand, she guzzled the rest of it down like a man dying of thirst before shoving the last handful of between her bulging cheeks, chewing slowly with her face flush with the utter gratification of having a full gut, not caring as her bright eyes watched while her body puffed outwards and her heaving weight made the stool shriek in agony.The feeling of being glut like a pig was very, very enjoyable.

At least, until her weight bubbled out to a whopping three hundred and thirty pounds and the stool finally had enough. A particularly loud series of SNAP! was heard before her eyes grew as big as dinner plates, Kenzi latching onto her engorged belly with plumper hands sinking into full flesh. "Uh-oh!"

The truly heavy weight goth yelped as her vast rear crashed loudly against the floor as she toppled the four feet from sitting, the flattened remains of the Dal Riata's seat underneath her hefty derriere. Jiggling for a moment, she let out a louder belch, the fall having jostled her insides, face going from red to the teensiest bit green. "Urp...uh...Trick? Can you...can you put this on my tab too?"

From the shadows a rather admiring gaze came from Bo, her electric blue eyes staring at Kenzi almost ravenously, a bead of sweat on her forehead. She just looked so delicious plumping up like that....
